title: Governing data, governing technology? Complementary approaches for the future of work
affiliations: University of Groningen - Faculty of Law

detail.title: Governing data, governing technology? Complementary approaches for the future of work

publicationDetails.detailsText: Global Workplace Law and Policy Blog

detail.abstract: An employer today can learn about interactions among employees or with customers via sensors and a vast variety of softwares. Is the tone of voice friendly enough with customers? How much time is spent on emailing or away from the assigned desk? Scores, ‘idle’ or silent buttons, are making the workplace a place where data is constantly accumulated and processed through Artificial Intelligence (AI) and the Internet of Things (IoT). Breaks can lead to penalties, from reduced bonuses to more serious sanctions. These are just examples that represent strong evidence in the labour law debate: the recourse to data is changing organisational models and increasing employers’ capability to monitor the workforce. Thus, the self-determination and purpose limitation principles offered by the current General Data Protection Regulation (EU Reg 2016/679) are now standing under the magnifying glass: can they preserve the order of powers in subordinate employment that datafication is disrupting? Or does guaranteeing individual rights against a vast and complex surveillance society risk creating an unequal David-and-Goliath conflict?  This contribution suggests that data protection law at work is and will be crucial in ensuring labour protection in datafied workplaces. The present focus, however, is dominated by AI and IoT needs to be complemented with the governance of technologies (thus not only of data flows) that place structural limitations on employees’ fundamental freedoms. A complementary approach that can be already recognised in the European Commission’s Industry 5.0 strategy, with the proposal for a regulation on artificial intelligence as one of the main (yet problematic) developments.

AI.tldr: 本文探讨了数据保护法在数据化工作场所中对劳动保护的重要性，并指出当前对AI和IoT的关注需辅以技术治理，以限制对员工基本自由的结构性影响。
AI.research_question: 数据保护法能否在数据化工作场所中确保劳动保护，并平衡雇主监控与员工权利？
AI.motivation: 数据化工作场所中雇主通过AI和IoT监控员工行为，可能破坏劳动法中的权力平衡，亟需法律框架保护员工权利。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于《通用数据保护条例》（GDPR）的自决和目的限制原则，探讨其在数据化工作场所中的应用与局限性。
AI.method: 通过分析当前法律框架（如GDPR）和技术治理（如欧盟工业5.0战略），提出补充性法律路径。
AI.findings: 数据保护法在劳动保护中至关重要，但需结合技术治理以限制对员工自由的潜在威胁。
AI.theory_contributions: 扩展了数据保护法在劳动法领域的理论应用，提出技术治理的补充框架。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者提供法律与技术结合的治理建议，以平衡雇主监控与员工权利。

title: Income Inequality and Bank Credit Supply: A THANK(ful) Approach
affiliations: Mount Allison University - Department of Economics

detail.title: Income Inequality and Bank Credit Supply: A THANK(ful) Approach
detail.abstract: While pre-tax income in the middle and top of the distribution is relatively stable over the business cycle, income at the bottom is strongly procyclical. As a result, income inequality is countercyclical. Since bank credit supply has been shown to play an important role over the business cycle, this paper asks: Do shifts in the supply of bank credit contribute to the observed cyclical fluctuations in income inequality? Using an estimated bank credit supply shock based on Bassett et al. (2014), I find that, first, a tightening of bank lending standards leads to a rise in income inequality due to a larger decrease in income at the bottom of the distribution relative to the middle and top. Second, compared to total factor income (TFI), labor income at the bottom of the distribution contracts more following the tightening of bank lending standards. As a result, labor income inequality rises by more than TFI inequality. Third, bank credit supply shocks account for a nontrivial amount of the cyclical variation of income inequality. Depending on the specification and inequality measure, bank credit supply shocks can account for up to 42% and 33% of the volatility of labor income inequality and TFI inequality, respectively. To rationalize these observations, I build a tractable heterogeneous agent New Keynesian (THANK) model with an income-skill complementarity among households: i.e., 'poor' hand-to-mouth households supply unskilled labor, while 'rich' unconstrained households supply skilled labor. Firms require a bank loan to pay their labor wage bills in advance of production. When the representative bank reduces its supply of credit to firms, the cost of borrowing rises, leading to a fall in labor demand of both skilled and unskilled workers. However, since it is costly for firms to adjust their skilled labor, firms optimally choose to cut their unskilled workforce by more. The result is a rise of income inequality as 'poor' households lose a larger share of income relative to the 'rich' households.

AI.tldr: 本文探讨银行信贷供给变化对收入不平等周期性波动的影响，发现信贷紧缩导致低收入群体收入下降更显著，从而加剧收入不平等。
AI.research_question: 银行信贷供给的变化是否对收入不平等的周期性波动有贡献？
AI.motivation: 收入不平等在商业周期中呈现反周期性，而银行信贷供给在商业周期中起重要作用，因此研究两者关系具有重要意义。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于Bassett et al. (2014)的银行信贷供给冲击估计，结合异质性代理人新凯恩斯模型（THANK模型）。
AI.method: 使用估计的银行信贷供给冲击，分析其对收入不平等的影响，并构建THANK模型解释观察结果。
AI.findings: 信贷紧缩导致低收入群体收入下降更显著，劳动收入不平等上升幅度大于总收入不平等；银行信贷供给冲击解释了收入不平等周期性波动的显著部分（最高42%和33%）。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出收入-技能互补性假设，解释信贷紧缩对收入不平等的影响机制。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者提供了银行信贷政策对收入不平等影响的实证依据。

title: The Relationship between Entrée Variety and Student Participation in School Lunch
affiliations: U.S. Department of Agriculture - Economic Research Service, Biden School of Public Policy & Administration, University of Delaware and Michigan State University, Department of Economics, Students

detail.title: The Relationship between Entrée Variety and Student Participation in School Lunch
detail.abstract: In the United States, about 40 percent of students choose not to participate in the National School Lunch Program. Offering more food choices at lunch may be one way to boost participation. We used longitudinal administrative data on 135,229 New York City grade 9-12 students, their schools, and school lunch menus for Fall 2016 to examine the link between the number of entrées offered and participation, and to explore whether the relationship varied by entrée type. We proxied for type by categorizing entrées as vegetarian, containing beef, or containing poultry-features observable, and plausibly important, to students. We also examined the moderating effect of universal free meals (UFM), an increasingly prevalent policy that is known to affect students' lunch participation decisions. We found evidence that the type of entrées offered were more important for participation among students than their number overall, and that students in UFM schools were more likely to be responsive to both the number and type of entrées available. These results suggest that investments in the types of entrées served rather than their number, and/or eliminating the cost of school meals to students, may have a larger impact on participation.

AI.tldr: 研究发现，美国约40%的学生不参与国家学校午餐计划。增加午餐选择可能提高参与率。通过对纽约市135,229名高中生的数据分析，发现菜品类型比数量更能影响参与率，且免费午餐政策进一步放大了这种影响。
AI.research_question: 增加午餐菜品数量或改变菜品类型是否能提高学生参与国家学校午餐计划的意愿？
AI.motivation: 约40%的美国学生不参与国家学校午餐计划，探讨如何通过调整午餐选择提高参与率。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于学生对菜品类型的偏好及免费午餐政策的影响。
AI.method: 使用2016年纽约市高中生的纵向行政数据，分析菜品数量和类型对参与率的影响。
AI.findings: 菜品类型比数量更能影响参与率，免费午餐政策进一步放大了这种影响。
AI.theory_contributions: 揭示了学生对菜品类型的偏好及其对参与率的影响机制。
AI.practical_contributions: 建议学校投资于菜品类型的改进或提供免费午餐，以提高参与率。

title: High risk aversion Merton's problem without transversality conditions
affiliations: Università di Bologna, Imperial College Business School, affiliation not provided to SSRN and Luiss

detail.title: High risk aversion Merton's problem without transversality conditions
detail.abstract: This paper revisits the classical Merton portfolio choice problem over infinite horizon for high risk aversion, addressing technical challenges related to establishing the existence and identification of optimal strategies. Traditional methods rely on perturbation arguments and/or impose restrictive conditions, such as large discount rates and/or bounded strategies, to ensure well-posedness. Our approach leverages the problem's homogeneity to directly solve the associated Hamilton-Jacobi-Bellman equation and verify the optimality of candidate strategies without requiring transversality conditions.

AI.tldr: 本文重新审视了高风险厌恶下的经典Merton无限期投资组合选择问题，解决了与最优策略存在性和识别相关的技术挑战。传统方法依赖扰动论证或施加限制性条件（如高折现率或有界策略）以确保问题适定性。我们的方法利用问题的同质性直接求解Hamilton-Jacobi-Bellman方程，并在无需横截性条件的情况下验证候选策略的最优性。
AI.research_question: 如何在高风险厌恶情况下解决Merton无限期投资组合选择问题中的技术挑战？
AI.motivation: 传统方法在解决Merton问题时依赖限制性条件或扰动论证，缺乏普适性。本文旨在提出一种更直接且无需额外条件的方法。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于Merton投资组合选择理论和Hamilton-Jacobi-Bellman方程。
AI.method: 利用问题的同质性直接求解Hamilton-Jacobi-Bellman方程，并验证候选策略的最优性。
AI.findings: 提出了一种无需横截性条件或其他限制性条件的方法，成功解决了高风险厌恶下的Merton问题。
AI.theory_contributions: 扩展了Merton投资组合选择理论的应用范围，提供了一种更通用的解决方案。
AI.practical_contributions: 为高风险厌恶投资者的投资决策提供了更灵活和实用的理论支持。

title: Once Upon a Time: Introducing the Historical Values Survey
affiliations: University of Hamburg - Institute of Law and Economics, University of Hamburg - Institute of Law & Economics and University of Trento, Department of Economics and Management

detail.title: Once Upon a Time: Introducing the Historical Values Survey
detail.abstract: This article introduces the Historical Values Survey. It contains information on historically prevalent values and norms encouraging cooperation, altruism, work ethic, entrepreneurship, tolerance, but also discrimination and the challenging of authority. Information on values and norms is elicited from more than 27,000 folk narratives relying on a Large Language Model. The Survey contains 36 variables and covers up to 172 countries. Folk narratives, such as legends and fairy tales, are transmitted from generation to generation virtually unchanged and thus constitute an excellent source for historically prevalent values and norms and for culture more broadly speaking. Including the values and norms into an economic growth model documents the relevance of culture for economic development.

AI.tldr: 本文介绍了历史价值观调查，通过分析超过27,000个民间叙事，揭示了历史上普遍存在的价值观和规范，包括合作、利他主义、职业道德、创业精神、宽容，以及歧视和挑战权威。调查包含36个变量，覆盖172个国家，并利用大型语言模型提取信息。研究发现文化对经济发展具有重要影响。
AI.research_question: 历史上普遍存在的价值观和规范如何影响经济发展？
AI.motivation: 探讨文化（尤其是民间叙事中体现的价值观和规范）对经济发展的潜在影响。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于文化经济学理论，分析民间叙事中体现的价值观和规范对经济发展的作用。
AI.method: 利用大型语言模型分析超过27,000个民间叙事，提取36个变量，覆盖172个国家。
AI.findings: 民间叙事中的价值观和规范（如合作、创业精神等）对经济发展具有显著影响。
AI.theory_contributions: 验证了文化经济学理论中文化对经济发展的作用。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者提供了文化因素在经济发展中的重要性依据。

title: All Quiet on the Fiscal Front? Off-Balance-Sheet Fiscal Agencies in the German War Economy, 1914-1918
affiliations: Global Climate Forum, University of Bath, Global Climate Forum and Global Climate Forum

detail.title: All Quiet on the Fiscal Front? Off-Balance-Sheet Fiscal Agencies in the German War Economy, 1914-1918

declarations.declarationOfInterest: No conflict of interest.
declarations.funderStatement: Steffen Murau acknowledges funding by Deutsche Forschungsgemeinschaft (German Research Foundation, DFG) for the Emmy Noether Research Group entitled “The Political Economy of Financing Large-Scale Transformations. Off-Balance-Sheet Fiscal Agencies in Wars, Reconstruction, and the Green Transition” (OBFA-TRANSFORM) carried out at Global Climate Forum and Freie Universität Berlin (project number 499921148).

detail.abstract: It is an established narrative in the literature that the German Empire financed World War I through an extensive issuance of sovereign debt with support of the central bank, the Reichsbank. Indeed, the sovereign debt burden of the Reich and the states combined increased from around 5 billion marks in 1914 to approximately 156 billion Marks in 1918 at the end of the war. Despite these staggering numbers, an understanding of war finance that merely focuses on the balance sheets of the treasury and the central bank cannot provide an accurate picture, as it misses out on the paramount role that off-balance-sheet fiscal agencies (OBFAs) played at the time. In this paper, we trace the activities of six types of OBFAs along three stages of the war finance operations from Summer 1914 to November 1918. First, the Seehandlung was Prussia’s state-bank that acted as market maker for sovereign debt, stimulated expansion and helped with funding throughout the war. Second, the Darlehnskassen (Loan Funds) were sub-balance sheets of the Reichsbank that supported expansion of the war economy by issuing Darlehnskassenscheine as a parallel currency and acted as market-maker for sovereign debt. Third, Kriegskreditbanken (War Credit Banks) were financial institutions that played an important role in the expansion phase of the first two months of war. Fourth, Kriegsgesellschaften (War Societies) were private sector institutions that became increasingly entangled with the state during the war and operated at an accelerated pace in the third stage as the war economy increasingly faced shortages. A similar dynamic was exhibited, fifth, by state-owned enterprises. Finally, industrial associations played an important role in the governance of the German war economy. To carve out the role of OBFAs in the war finance activities, we reconstruct the monetary architecture of the German war economy and translate the activities of the treasury, the Reichsbank, and key OBFAs into flow charts that analytically distinguish between initial expansion and long-term funding. By unpacking the role of OBFAs rather than the treasury–Reichsbank dyad commonly emphasised in financial historiography, we extend the Critical Macro‑Finance perspective into the realm of early‑twentieth‑century war finance.

AI.tldr: 本文探讨了德国在第一次世界大战期间通过表外财政机构（OBFAs）在战争融资中的关键作用，而不仅仅是传统的财政部与中央银行的二元视角。
AI.research_question: 表外财政机构（OBFAs）在德国第一次世界大战期间的战争融资中扮演了怎样的角色？
AI.motivation: 现有文献主要关注财政部与中央银行的资产负债表，忽略了OBFAs在战争融资中的重要作用，本文旨在填补这一空白。
AI.theoretical_framework: 本文基于批判性宏观金融视角，分析战争融资中的货币架构。
AI.method: 通过追踪六类OBFAs的活动，重建德国战争经济的货币架构，并用流程图分析其融资过程。
AI.findings: OBFAs在战争融资的扩张和长期资金支持中发挥了关键作用，包括市场操作、货币发行和资金调配等。
AI.theory_contributions: 扩展了批判性宏观金融理论在20世纪初战争融资中的应用。
AI.practical_contributions: 为理解现代战争融资和表外机构的作用提供了历史借鉴。

title: Dam Management in the Era of Climate Change
affiliations: Università di Bologna, Université d'Évry, University of Pisa - Department of Economics and Management and Tunis El Manar University

detail.title: Dam Management in the Era of Climate Change
detail.abstract: Climate change has a dramatic impact, particularly by concentrating rainfall into a few short periods, interspersed by long dry spells. In this context, the role of dams is crucial. We consider the optimal control of a dam, where the water level must not exceed a designated safety threshold, nor fall below a minimum level to ensure functionality and sustainability for for the outgoing river. To model dry spells and intense rainfall events, commonly referred to as water bombs, we introduce a Hawkes process, a well-known example of a self-exciting process characterised by time-correlated intensity, which endogenously reproduces the concentration of events. The problem is formulated as an optimal switching problem with constraints. We establish existence results and propose numerical methods for approximating the solution. Finally, we illustrate the main achievements of this approach through numerical examples. The main and counterintuitive result of our numerical analysis is that the optimal water level inside the dam increases with the self-exciting parameter. This result shows that, when facing the dilemma of managing the opposing risks of dam overtopping and dry spells, the former ultimately dominates the latter. In conclusion, dams will increasingly lose their role as water reserves and take on a greater role in flood protection.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了气候变化背景下大坝的最优控制问题，通过引入Hawkes过程模拟极端降雨事件，发现最优水位会随自激励参数增加而上升，表明大坝在洪水防护中的作用将超过蓄水功能。
AI.research_question: 在气候变化导致降雨极端化的背景下，如何优化大坝的水位控制以平衡洪水风险和干旱风险？
AI.motivation: 气候变化使降雨集中在少数时段，导致干旱和洪水风险并存，大坝管理面临新挑战。
AI.theoretical_framework: 采用Hawkes过程模拟极端降雨事件的自激励特性，将其建模为带约束的最优切换问题。
AI.method: 建立理论存在性结果，并提出数值方法近似求解最优控制问题。
AI.findings: 数值分析显示，最优水位随自激励参数增加而上升，表明洪水风险最终主导干旱风险。
AI.theory_contributions: 将Hawkes过程引入大坝控制问题，为极端事件建模提供了新方法。
AI.practical_contributions: 研究结果提示大坝管理需更注重防洪功能，而非传统蓄水功能。

title: Import Competition and Productivity of U.S. Fruit and Vegetable Farms
affiliations: Virginia Tech and Texas Tech University

detail.title: Import Competition and Productivity of U.S. Fruit and Vegetable Farms
detail.abstract: U.S. imports of fruits and vegetables (FV) increased from $2.7 billion in 1990 to $29.4 billion in 2022, but few studies have assessed the impact of this rising import competition on U.S. FV farms. This study provides the first analysis of how import competition affects total factor productivity (TFP) of U.S. FV farms, using farm-level data from the Census of Agriculture for 2007, 2012, and 2017. Employing an instrumental variables strategy that leverages exogenous supply shocks to address endogeneity, we find that a 100-percentage-point increase in import competition raises FV farms' TFP by 1.1%. This productivity gain stems from the exit of less productive farms and TFP growth among surviving ones. Heterogeneous analysis indicates that larger farms experience a large TFP growth. We also find an inverse-U relationship between import competition and farm-level TFP growth, indicating that farms facing extreme competition experience TFP declines. Further analysis shows that import competition reduces FV farms' cropland acreage and intermediate input expenditure but does not affect capital expenditure, suggesting no increase in mechanization in response to import pressure.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了美国水果和蔬菜进口竞争对农场全要素生产率（TFP）的影响，发现进口竞争提升了生产率，但极端竞争会导致生产率下降。
AI.research_question: 美国水果和蔬菜进口竞争如何影响农场的全要素生产率（TFP）？
AI.motivation: 尽管美国水果和蔬菜进口大幅增长，但缺乏对其对国内农场生产率影响的研究。
AI.theoretical_framework: 全要素生产率（TFP）理论、市场竞争与生产率关系。
AI.method: 利用农业普查数据（2007、2012、2017年），采用工具变量策略解决内生性问题。
AI.findings: 进口竞争每增加100个百分点，农场TFP提升1.1%；极端竞争导致TFP下降。
AI.theory_contributions: 揭示了进口竞争与农场生产率之间的非线性关系。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者提供了进口竞争对农业生产率影响的实证依据。

title: Ageing and gender: An intersectional lens for inclusive city-building practices in the Global North and Global South
affiliations: Norwegian University of Science and Technology (NTNU)

detail.title: Ageing and gender: An intersectional lens for inclusive city-building practices in the Global North and Global South

declarations.declarationOfInterest: No conflict of interest.
declarations.ethicsApproval: This research was primarily based on literature review.
declarations.funderStatement: No funding source.

detail.abstract: Inclusive urban policies and city-building practices must prioritise gender mainstreaming, but there is a dearth of research exploring how this approach can address the intersectional needs of different genders. Additionally, empirical insights from diverse contexts are necessary to gain a nuanced understanding of the ageing-in-place debate. To shed light on the global challenges of gender and ageing disparities, this chapter uses intersectionality as a theoretical lens to analyse current urban planning policies and practices. By examining case studies from both the Global North and Global South, it discusses how intersectionality can inform efforts to mainstream gender and ageing in urban planning. Furthermore, this chapter underscores the interdependencies between intersectionality and gender mainstreaming and how they can facilitate age- and gender-appropriate planning and design strategies. While promising initiatives to address ageing in place have emerged in some cities and countries, planning policies and city-building practices in many developmental contexts still perpetuate patriarchal social norms. Therefore, systemic consideration is needed to create holistic and inclusive urban environments. Ultimately, this chapter argues that applying an intersectional lens to gender mainstreaming in urban planning can prioritise the ethics of care and create age-friendly environments.

AI.tldr: 本章通过交叉性理论分析城市规划中的性别主流化与老龄化问题，强调全球南北案例研究，提出需系统性考虑以创建包容性城市环境。
AI.research_question: 如何通过交叉性理论视角解决城市规划中的性别与老龄化需求？
AI.motivation: 现有研究缺乏对交叉性需求的分析，且需多元背景的实证研究以深入理解老龄化问题。
AI.theoretical_framework: 交叉性理论作为理论框架，分析性别主流化与老龄化在城市规划中的关系。
AI.method: 通过全球南北案例研究，分析现有城市规划政策与实践。
AI.findings: 交叉性理论可指导性别与老龄化的主流化，但许多发展背景仍受父权规范影响。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出交叉性理论在性别主流化与老龄化规划中的应用价值。
AI.practical_contributions: 为创建包容性城市环境提供系统性策略，强调关怀伦理与适老化设计。

title: Rank Envy for the Random Assignment Problem
affiliations: Ferdowsi University of Mashhad, Iran

detail.title: Rank Envy for the Random Assignment Problem

declarations.funderStatement: I gratefully acknowledge support from the Swiss National Science Foundation (SNFS) through Project 100018-212311.

keywords: Random Serial Acceptance Rule. JEL Classi…cation Numbers: C78

detail.abstract: In this paper, we focus on malicious envy of others' happiness levels and introduce a new fairness criterion that considers how agents assess their relative satisfaction based on the ranking of their assigned objects. We propose two main notions: (weakly) rank envy-free assignments, where no agent perceives another as being strictly better off in terms of rank-based satisfaction, and ex-post minimal rank envy, which aims to reduce overall rank envy when it is not possible to eliminate it. Our findings indicate that there is a trade-off between achieving rank envy-freeness and attaining ex-post Pareto efficiency or standard envy-freeness. Furthermore, the concept of minimal rank envy is positioned between rank efficiency and Pareto efficiency. Lastly, we introduce a Random Serial Acceptance rule that produces random assignments with ex-post minimal rank envy.

detail.title: A Composite Approach to Nonlinear Inflation Dynamics in BRICS Countries and Türkiye

publicationDetails.journalName: Bank of Finland Research Paper Series

detail.abstract: This study introduces a novel composite approach to nonlinear inflation dynamics in identifying historical inflation patterns and forecasting future regime shifts. Assuming inflation’s responsiveness to its determinants varies across inflation regimes and that inflation shock magnitude shapes the dynamics, we endogenously identify distinct inflation regimes and analyze nonlinear behaviors within such regimes for the BRICS countries (Brazil, Russia, India, China, and South Africa) and Türkiye. In the first stage of our analysis, we employ a Hidden Markov Regime Switching Model combined with Monte Carlo simulations to establish high- and low-inflation thresholds. In the second stage, we utilize an ordered probit model to identify nonlinear probabilistic relationships between inflation regimes and key drivers of inflation such as unit labor costs, exchange rates, and global inflation. Our method achieves over 90% accuracy in predicting inflation regimes based on historical data. It also shows particularly strong out-of-sample performance in the post-pandemic period, outperforming the forecasts of international financial institutions. Even without prior knowledge of exogenous variables, the method anticipates regime shifts in five of the six countries analyzed for 2022 and 2023. Our approach offers researchers and central bankers a robust alternative analytical framework for managing high- and low-inflation environments where traditional linear or equilibrium-based models fall short.

detail.title: Weak Ex-post Pareto Efficiency for the Random Assignment Problem
detail.abstract: We introduce weak ex-post Pareto efficiency, a slightly weaker notion than ex-post Pareto efficiency. We strengthen the impossibility between ex-post Pareto efficiency, strategyproofness, and envy-freeness in the random assignment problem and show that it prevails if ex-post Pareto efficiency is weakened to weak ex-post Pareto efficiency. Moreover, if we allow for weak preferences, the impossibility continues to hold even if we replace strategyproofness with weak strategyproofness.

detail.abstract: How do large disruptions to ecosystems affect human well-being? This paper tests the long-standing hypothesis that China's 1958 Four Pests Campaign, which exterminated sparrows despite scientists' warnings about their pest-control role, exacerbated the Great Famine-the largest in human history. Combining newly digitized data on historical agricultural productivity in China with habitat suitability modeling methods in ecology, we find that, after sparrow eradication, a one-standard-deviation increase in sparrow suitability led to 5.3% larger rice and 8.7% larger wheat declines. State food procurement exacerbated these losses, resulting in a 9.6% higher mortality in high-suitability counties-implying nearly two million excess deaths.

declarations.funderStatement: I gratefully acknowledge support from the Swiss National Science Foundation (SNFS) through Project 100018_212311.

detail.abstract: A deterministic assignment that allocates a set of objects to some agents is popular if it is not popular-dominated, i.e., there is no other one where a majority of agents are better off. As the notion of popularity, i.e., democratic efficiency, is a refinement of Pareto efficiency, we introduce a weakly popular assignment as a Pareto assignment that is not popular-dominated by any popular assignment. We call a random assignment ex-post weakly popular if it has a lottery over weakly popular assignments. We introduce an upper-contour strategyproof rule that provides an ex-post weakly popular random assignment and satisfies equal treatment of equals and non-bossiness. Finally, we prove two strong impossibility results between ex-post popularity and fairness, in the sense of weak envy-freeness and equal division lower bound.

detail.title: "Reciprocal" Tariffs: What are They Really For?

publicationDetails.detailsText: Peterson Institute for International Economics Policy Brief 25-6
publicationDetails.journalName: Peterson Institute for International Economics (PIIE) Research Paper Series

detail.abstract: This Policy Brief evaluates the evolving reasons for and application of the Trump administration's "reciprocal" tariffs and finds them wanting. The tariffs, adjusted most recently on August 1, 2025, were originally supposed to achieve reciprocity between the United States and its trading partners but were based on a defective measure because bilateral imbalances do not necessarily indicate foreign unfair trade practices; the methodology used to estimate the reciprocal tariffs was biased towards overstatement, particularly for countries producing primary commodities, which will have high pass-through into US final prices, and for countries exporting products with high import content. Given these defects, the reciprocal tariffs are better seen as a dressed-up anchoring ploy to strengthen America's hand in negotiations rather than credible estimates of the unfair trade practices that the United States faces. Moreover, even if reduced to 15 percent, the application of these tariffs to America's poorest trading partners would do little to reduce the overall US trade deficit but considerably harm their economic development.

title: Guerilla Marketing in the Age of Digital Technologies
affiliations: FHNW School of Business

detail.title: Guerilla Marketing in the Age of Digital Technologies
detail.abstract: This article investigates the effectiveness of guerrilla marketing in the contemporary digital age. Originating from military tactics and popularized in the marketing world by Levinson in 1984, guerrilla marketing emphasizes creativity and unconventional approaches over large budgets to reach consumers. While initially conceived in a pre-digital landscape, this research argues that the core principles of guerrilla marketing are not only still relevant but are amplified by the accessibility, low barriers to entry, and reach of digital technologies. The article provides a foundational understanding of guerrilla marketing, including its definition, historical context, basic concepts, and key rules. It then explores the arsenal of guerrilla tactics, categorizing them into minimedia, maximedia, and contemporary approaches like ambient, buzz, viral, and ambush marketing. A significant portion of the article is dedicated to analysing the application and effectiveness of guerrilla marketing in the digital era. It examines the role of social media platforms, the strategic use of memes, the power of generating online buzz, and the potential of generative artificial intelligence as tools for modern guerrilla marketers. Case studies, such as the unconventional Facebook strategy of a Polish funeral services company and Wendy's adept use of memes, illustrate the successful adaptation of guerrilla principles in the digital sphere. The article also addresses ethical concerns surrounding certain guerrilla marketing tactics, acknowledging the need for marketers to navigate legal and social norms carefully to avoid backlash. Ultimately, the findings suggest that guerrilla marketing is not only effective in the digital age but possesses an enhanced potential for impact due to the inherent virality and reach of online platforms. While the fundamental requirement for creativity and unconventional thinking remains paramount, digital technologies provide a fertile ground for guerrilla marketers to operate with agility, target specific audiences, and achieve significant brand awareness and engagement, often with limited financial resources. The article concludes that in an increasingly cluttered advertising environment, the core tenets of guerrilla marketing – creativity, surprise, and impactful messaging – are more critical than ever for brands seeking to stand out and connect with consumers.

detail.abstract: India's e-commerce has a bright future because of the country's rapidly advancing technology and changing consumer habits. The report analyses potential developments, obstacles, and trends in India's e-commerce market. It looks at how customer preferences are changing as a result of more people using smartphones and the internet-two major drivers propelling the expansion of e-commerce. The domination of internet shopping, the growth of mobile commerce, and the advent of social shopping are notable trends. It also draws attention to the industry's tremendous obstacles, which include a lack of resources, complicated infrastructure requirements, regulatory barriers, and fierce competition. The report makes recommendations about how to deal with E-commerce in India: Trends, Obstacles, and Growth Opportunities these difficulties. It also emphasises how crucial cross-border e-commerce, sustainable business methods, and customised consumer experiences are to the development and uniqueness of India's e-commerce sector. In the end, this essay seeks to steer India's future e-commerce by navigating these development avenues, resolving issues, and grasping chances. It offers vital information for lawmakers, investors seeking profitable opportunities, and e-commerce companies. Gaining insight into this ever changing sector enables stakeholders to contribute to India's burgeoning e-commerce ecosystem and make wise decisions.

title: The World of Roblox and its Deviations
affiliations: affiliation not provided to SSRN and University of Barcelona

detail.title: The World of Roblox and its Deviations
detail.abstract: The purpose of this article is to analyse the harmful design practices identified in the Roblox environment, as well as the criticisms and complaints that the company has faced in relation to the exposure of children and adolescents to unsafe spaces. The study examines not only these practices, but also the actions proposed by the company for the first half of 2025, which aim to reinforce the protection of this audience. To this end, an analysis of documentation in the non-academic press has been carried out. The results show that, despite the fact that the company has intensified its child protection policy and participation systems, there is still scope for improvement in terms of its adequacy for underage users. Finally, recommendations are presented to make Roblox and other interactive environments safer and more suitable for children and teenagers, while preserving their playful nature. At the same time, however, it is considered that data literacy among users and families is essential to raise awareness and protect personal data and guarantee safety in digital environments.

AI.tldr: 本文分析了Roblox环境中的有害设计实践及其对儿童和青少年的潜在危害，同时探讨了公司2025年上半年的改进措施。研究发现，尽管公司加强了保护政策，但仍需进一步优化未成年人保护机制。

keywords: Insurance Services. Policyholders JEL classification: M31

detail.abstract: This study investigates the role of service innovation in enhancing perceived value and customer satisfaction among insurance policyholders. This study, motivated by the growing importance of innovation in meeting the evolving needs of customers within the competitive and rapidly transforming insurance sector, provides insights about innovative practices impact on consumer perceptions and satisfaction levels. Using a mixed-method approach, including a survey of 400 policyholders across diverse age groups, the study examines the relationships among service innovation, perceived value, and customer satisfaction. Through Ordinary Least Squares (OLS) regression, study showed that the value of adopting customer-centric, innovative strategies in insurance services is useful to foster stronger client relationships and loyalty, and service innovation significantly enhances perceived value, which in turn positively influences customer satisfaction.

title: The Market Reaction to Free Cash Flow News
affiliations: Ohio State University (OSU), University of Washington - Michael G. Foster School of Business and University of Washington

detail.title: The Market Reaction to Free Cash Flow News
detail.abstract: The stock market reacts to free cash flow news at the time of the earnings announcement. The reaction is stronger when free cash flow is predicted to be more informative: for growth firms and firms with noisy earnings, and when the earnings announcement mentions free cash flow. Both the market response to free cash flow news and the frequency of free cash flow mentions have increased over time. Results suggest that the decision to mention free cash flow correlates with underlying firm characteristics, which have shifted over time. Free cash flow news and earnings news are generally complements, although they are substitutes when earnings are particularly noisy.

AI.tldr: 股票市场在盈利公告时对自由现金流新闻有反应，且反应强度与自由现金流的预测信息量相关。增长型企业、盈利噪音较大的企业以及公告中提及自由现金流时，市场反应更强。市场对自由现金流新闻的反应频率随时间增加。结果表明，提及自由现金流的决策与企业特征相关，这些特征随时间变化。自由现金流新闻与盈利新闻通常是互补的，但在盈利噪音较大时是替代关系。
AI.research_question: 股票市场如何对自由现金流新闻作出反应？这种反应是否与企业的特定特征相关？
AI.motivation: 研究自由现金流新闻在盈利公告时的市场反应，以揭示投资者对自由现金流的关注程度及其随时间的变化。
AI.theoretical_framework: 信息不对称理论、信号传递理论、市场效率理论。
AI.method: 基于历史股票市场数据和盈利公告文本分析，采用事件研究法和回归分析。
AI.findings: 市场对自由现金流新闻的反应强度与企业的增长性、盈利噪音及公告中是否提及自由现金流相关；反应频率随时间增加；自由现金流新闻与盈利新闻通常是互补关系，但在盈利噪音较大时为替代关系。
AI.theory_contributions: 丰富了自由现金流信息在资本市场中的作用研究，揭示了其与盈利信息的动态关系。
AI.practical_contributions: 为投资者提供关于自由现金流信息重要性的实证依据，帮助企业优化信息披露策略。

title: Is Complexity Virtuous?
affiliations: University of Denver - Daniels College of Business and University of Denver - Daniels College of Business

detail.title: Is Complexity Virtuous?
detail.abstract: Kelly et al. (2024) show that increasing complexity in linear models, with potentially thousands of predictors, is "virtuous". Their work contradicts the dogma of model selection, including the Principles of Parsimony and Occam's Razor. They find that when the number of predictors far exceeds the number of observations, the bias-variance trade-off breaks down, the variance declines, and the Sharpe ratio increases. In the context of ridge regression, we find that very high complexity coupled with large penalty terms (excessive shrinkage) generate forecasts that converge to a rolling window of past returns. For example, we show the past twelve-month moving average of actual returns is 97.5% correlated to the forecasts from a twelve-month rolling window of random Fourier features with a large penalty. This finding is consistent with the theory of ridge regression. As the penalty term increases, the forecasts closely approximate the mean, and ignore the explanatory variables. Thus, increasing complexity does not outperform the standard ridge regression, and increasing complexity does not generate high Sharpe ratios, abnormal returns, utility gains or profitable investment strategies.

AI.tldr: Kelly等人（2024）研究表明，在线性模型中增加复杂性（可能涉及数千个预测变量）是“有益的”，这与模型选择的传统原则（如简约原则和奥卡姆剃刀）相矛盾。他们发现，当预测变量数量远超观测值时，偏差-方差权衡失效，方差下降，夏普比率上升。然而，在岭回归中，高复杂性与大惩罚项结合会导致预测结果趋近于过去收益的滚动窗口均值，无法超越标准岭回归或带来额外收益。
AI.research_question: 在线性模型中增加复杂性（尤其是预测变量数量远超观测值时）是否能够改善预测性能？
AI.motivation: 挑战传统模型选择原则（如简约原则和奥卡姆剃刀），探索高复杂性模型在特定条件下的表现。
AI.theoretical_framework: 偏差-方差权衡理论、岭回归理论、随机傅里叶特征方法。
AI.method: 使用岭回归和随机傅里叶特征方法，分析高复杂性模型在预测变量远超观测值时的表现。
AI.findings: 高复杂性模型在特定条件下（预测变量远超观测值）方差下降，夏普比率上升，但无法超越标准岭回归或带来额外收益。预测结果趋近于过去收益的滚动窗口均值。
AI.theory_contributions: 揭示了高复杂性模型在特定条件下的表现，挑战了传统模型选择原则。
AI.practical_contributions: 为高复杂性模型的应用提供了边界条件，表明其在实际预测中可能无法带来额外收益。

detail.title: Dismantling the Independence of Anti-Corruption Agencies in Ukraine: Legal Analysis and Implications for Reforms and European Integration
detail.abstract: This article examines the impact of Law of Ukraine No. 12414, adopted on July 22, 2025, on the institutional independence of the National Anti-Corruption Bureau of Ukraine (NABU) and the Specialized Anti-Corruption Prosecutor’s Office (SAPO). The law significantly expands the powers of the Prosecutor General of Ukraine, effectively subordinating key anti-corruption bodies to his authority. The article analyzes the legal implications of these changes, the international response, and the potential impact on Ukraine’s path toward European integration and the rule of law

title: Censorship by Perception: LLM Predictions of Social Media
affiliations: University of Florida - Warrington College of Business Administration, Public Utility Research Center and University of Florida

detail.title: Censorship by Perception: LLM Predictions of Social Media
detail.abstract: We investigate how knowledge of news regarding government surveillance of social media affects behavior. Prior research documents user self-censorship through surveys and case studies, which make generalizing hard. We address this gap by using large language models (LLMs)-including ChatGPT, Claude, Llama, and Gemini-to simulate how diverse U.S. user profiles respond to knowledge of government surveillance. We design a multistage game in which LLMs act as social media users. We give them news on which they can comment and share, sometimes with and sometimes without knowledge from other news sources that the government is monitoring social media. Preliminary results show users modify their postings and the degree of change depends on each user's political leanings and the topic.

AI.tldr: 本研究利用大型语言模型（如ChatGPT、Claude、Llama和Gemini）模拟美国多样化用户对政府监控社交媒体新闻的反应，填补了现有研究中难以推广的空白。

AI.method: 设计多阶段游戏，让大型语言模型模拟社交媒体用户，并在不同情境下（是否知晓政府监控）进行评论和分享。

title: Bridging Data Gaps in Emissions Forecasting: A Credibility-Weighted, Scenario-Interpolated Framework for Corporate Net-Zero Assessment
affiliations: University College London, Lombard Odier Darier Hentsch & Cie - Lombard Odier Investment Management, Lombard Odier Darier Hentsch & Cie - Lombard Odier Investment Management and New York University (NYU)

detail.title: Bridging Data Gaps in Emissions Forecasting: A Credibility-Weighted, Scenario-Interpolated Framework for Corporate Net-Zero Assessment
detail.abstract: Accurately forecasting corporate greenhouse gas (GHG) emissions trajectories is essential for evaluating company alignment with Net-Zero and Paris Agreement objectives and informing portfoliolevel climate strategies. Existing forecasting approaches-relying on simple statistical models or rigid scenario matching-struggle with sparse and heterogeneous corporate disclosures, limiting their reliability and practical relevance. This paper introduces a novel, credibility-weighted forecasting framework that jointly integrates historical emissions data and forward-looking decarbonisation targets, assigning quantitative weights based on the credibility and source of each data point, to account for its reliability. By applying linear interpolation between sectoral and regional benchmark decarbonisation pathways (e.g., NGFS scenarios), the method generates continuous, scenario-aligned Implied Temperature Rise (ITR) metrics even in the presence of incomplete or inconsistent data. Empirical analysis of circa 1,400 listed companies across multiple sectors and geographies demonstrates that the approach improves forecasting accuracy, achieves stronger scenario alignment, and exposes areas of target over-or under-ambition that conventional models miss. These results offer clear guidance for investors and regulators seeking robust, scalable, and transparent tools to assess corporate Net-Zero alignment and inform climate-related portfolio decisions.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种新颖的、基于可信度加权的温室气体排放预测框架，整合历史数据和前瞻性目标，提高了预测准确性和情景一致性。

AI.theoretical_framework: 可信度加权预测框架，结合历史排放数据和前瞻性脱碳目标，并根据数据点的可信度和来源分配权重。
AI.method: 通过线性插值法整合行业和区域基准脱碳路径（如NGFS情景），生成连续的、情景一致的隐含温升（ITR）指标。

AI.practical_contributions: 为投资者和监管机构提供了更可靠、可扩展和透明的工具，用于评估企业的净零一致性和气候相关投资决策。

title: Liquidity and Monetary Policy with Fraudulent Assets
affiliations: Kent State University - Department of Economics and Grinnell College - Department of Economics

detail.title: Liquidity and Monetary Policy with Fraudulent Assets
detail.abstract: This paper studies the role of money as a safe, fraud-free asset within an environment where asset trading is subject to fraudulent practices. We develop a New-Monetarist model with endogenous costly fraud and screening, which jointly determine the presence of fraudulent assets as well as liquidity. Without money, fraud arises in equilibrium when the costs of fraud and screening are sufficiently low. This occurs as random screening acts to relax the asset resalability constraint that normally prevents fraud from occurring. Money can substitute for random screening as a device to relax the asset resalability constraint, and thus, fraud never arises when money is valued. The model highlights monetary policy implications for fraud incentives and asset liquidity.

AI.tldr: 本文探讨了在资产交易存在欺诈行为的环境中，货币作为一种安全、无欺诈资产的作用。通过构建一个内生欺诈成本和筛选的新货币主义模型，研究发现货币可以替代随机筛选机制，从而消除欺诈行为。

detail.title: Does perceived social norms mediates the relationship between the attitude and buying intention towards Eco-friendly products?

declarations.declarationOfInterest: NO
declarations.ethicsApproval: NO
declarations.funderStatement: NO

keywords.keywords: Attitude; Buying Intention; Perceived Social Norms;

publicationDetails.detailsText: Journal of Management Research and Analysis, volume 12, issue 2, 2025[10.18231/j.jmra.2025.021]

detail.abstract: Attitude of the consumer is considered as one of the indispensable factor that not only shapes the personality but also influence significantly the buying intention of the consumer towards consumption of eco-friendly products. Earlier studies, has shown strong evidence of the influence of attitude on the consumer' buying intention. In contrary, some studies further holds that along with attitude of the consumer the buying experience influenced by the perceived social norms plays an important role in persuading the buying intention of the consumer. However the earlier studies have not clearly stated the importance of social norms is justifying the relationship between the attitude and buying intention. The thrust of the current research is based on a pertinent question, is the relationship between attitudes of the consumer and buying intention towards eco-friendly products is mediated by perceived social norms? To explore such relationship, the researcher has adopted multistage sampling method and data was collected from 428 respondents. Further, Smart-PLS approach was adopted to do the data analysis. The outcome of the study revealed that both the attitude of the consumer and perceive social norms have positive influence on the buying intention of the consumer towards consumption of eco-friendly products. Moreover, the "perceived social norms" mediate the relationship between the "attitude" and "buying intention" of the consumer. The finding of the study strongly affirms the existence of partial mediation. The research findings not only gives a basis understanding about the complex buying behaviour of the consumer but also developing a new horizon of knowledge for the marketers to improve their marketing communication to entice the eco-friendly consumers.

AI.tldr: 消费者态度和感知社会规范对购买环保产品意图的影响研究，发现两者均对购买意图有正向影响，且感知社会规范在态度与购买意图间起部分中介作用。

AI.theory_contributions: 明确了社会规范在态度与购买意图关系中的中介作用，丰富了消费者行为理论。
AI.practical_contributions: 为营销人员提供了改进营销沟通以吸引环保消费者的新视角。

title: Trust, Thought, and Toil: Capitalism as an Institutional Filter on Innovation
affiliations: RMIT University

detail.title: Trust, Thought, and Toil: Capitalism as an Institutional Filter on Innovation
detail.abstract: Critiques of capitalism frequently focus on its distributive consequences or alleged social harms, often overlooking the institutional mechanisms that direct capitalist innovation. This paper reframes the evaluation of capitalism by arguing that its core strength lies in its capacity to generate innovations that systematically reduce the burdens of human limitation, namely physical effort, limited trust, and bounded cognition. Drawing on a typology of constraint-reducing innovation, I examine how capitalist institutions, through the mechanisms of profit and loss, channel entrepreneurial discovery toward solutions that expand the scope of voluntary cooperation. The analysis engages with the Theory of the Adjacent Possible (TAP) and argues that while TAP provides a compelling account of the expansion of innovation possibilities, it lacks a plausible selection mechanism. The contribution of this paper is to identify capitalist institutions as providing that missing selection function. The result is not random technological change, but a patterned directionality. Innovations that survive and scale are those that reduce the cost of coordination in large-scale societies. Contemporary cases including blockchain and artificial intelligence are examined as extensions of this logic. The broader conclusion is that capitalism should not be judged solely by its outcomes, but by its institutional capacity to solve coordination problems and reduce the burdens of being human.

AI.tldr: 本文重新评估资本主义，认为其核心优势在于通过创新系统性减少人类局限（如体力、信任和认知限制）的能力，而非仅关注分配结果或社会危害。
AI.research_question: 资本主义的核心优势是什么？其如何通过创新减少人类局限？
AI.motivation: 现有对资本主义的批评多关注分配或社会危害，忽视了其创新机制。本文旨在填补这一空白。
AI.theoretical_framework: 邻近可能性理论（TAP）与资本主义制度的选择机制。
AI.method: 基于约束减少创新的分类法，分析资本主义制度如何通过利润和损失机制引导创新。
AI.findings: 资本主义制度为创新提供了选择功能，使技术变革具有方向性，减少大规模社会的协调成本。
AI.theory_contributions: 补充了TAP理论中缺失的选择机制，提出资本主义制度是这一机制的关键。
AI.practical_contributions: 为评估资本主义提供了新视角，强调其解决协调问题和减少人类局限的能力。

title: The Future of Meaningful Work
affiliations: University of Arizona - Department of Political Economy and Moral Science

detail.title: The Future of Meaningful Work
detail.abstract: This paper explores the ways in which capitalism both enables and frustrates individualism and the pursuit of self-realization. I discuss the tensions between personal authenticity and the pursuit of well-paying jobs, and the claim that the best way of dealing with the increased uncertainty caused by economic disruption is the more widespread adoption and teaching of Sarasvathy's entrepreneurial mindset.

AI.tldr: 本文探讨资本主义如何既促进又阻碍个人主义与自我实现，分析个人真实性与高薪职业追求之间的张力，并提出应对经济不确定性的最佳方式是推广Sarasvathy的创业思维。
AI.research_question: 资本主义如何影响个人主义与自我实现的追求？
AI.motivation: 研究资本主义背景下个人主义与职业选择之间的冲突，以及如何应对经济不确定性。
AI.theoretical_framework: Sarasvathy的创业思维理论。
AI.method: 理论分析与讨论。
AI.findings: 资本主义既支持又限制个人主义，创业思维是应对经济不确定性的有效方式。
AI.theory_contributions: 深化对资本主义与个人主义关系的理解，推广创业思维的理论应用。
AI.practical_contributions: 为教育与实践提供应对经济不确定性的策略。

title: The Misapplication of Statistical Methods in Liberal Arts: A Critical Analysis of Academic Publishing Bias Against Theoretical Research
affiliations: Shenyang Normal University

detail.title: The Misapplication of Statistical Methods in Liberal Arts: A Critical Analysis of Academic Publishing Bias Against Theoretical Research
detail.abstract: This article critically examines the widespread misuse of statistical methods in liberal arts and social sciences research, contrasting it with the proper application of statistics in physical sciences. While statistical physics and mass spectrometry demonstrate the correct application of statistical mathematics to natural phenomena, liberal arts disciplines have increasingly privileged data-driven research over theoretical reasoning, leading to a fundamental distortion of the academic research paradigm. This bias has created a scientific culture that systematically devalues low-probability but scientifically significant events and theoretical innovation in favor of statistically significant but potentially spurious correlations. The article argues that this trend represents a departure from the foundational principles of scientific inquiry, which should prioritize logical reasoning and theoretical understanding over mere data collection. The consequences extend beyond methodology to affect the very nature of academic discourse, where theoretical contributions are dismissed as "opinion pieces" while empirically-supported but theoretically shallow work is privileged. This misapplication of statistical thinking has created barriers to paradigm-shifting research and theoretical innovation across both humanities and natural sciences.

AI.tldr: 本文批判了文科与社会科学研究中统计方法的滥用，对比了其在自然科学中的正确应用，指出数据驱动研究对理论推理的压制导致学术研究范式的扭曲。
AI.research_question: 文科与社会科学研究中统计方法的滥用如何扭曲学术研究范式？
AI.motivation: 统计方法在文科与社会科学中的误用导致理论创新被忽视，学术文化偏向统计显著性而非科学意义。
AI.theoretical_framework: 统计物理学与质谱分析的正确统计应用；文科研究中数据驱动范式的理论偏差。
AI.method: 批判性分析与对比研究。
AI.findings: 统计方法的滥用压制了低概率但科学意义重大的事件与理论创新，扭曲了学术文化。
AI.theory_contributions: 揭示了统计方法误用对理论推理的负面影响，呼吁回归科学探究的基本原则。
AI.practical_contributions: 为学术界提供了反思统计方法应用的视角，促进理论与实证研究的平衡。

reference: HUN-REN KRTK Policy Brief No. 2. Budapest: HUN-REN Centre for Economic and Regional Studies.
title: Who would support and pay for a residential carbon tax in Hungary – and under what conditions?
affiliations: HUN-REN Centre for Economic and Regional Studies and HUN-REN Centre for Economic and Regional Studies

detail.title: Who would support and pay for a residential carbon tax in Hungary – and under what conditions?

publicationDetails.detailsText: HUN-REN KRTK Policy Brief No. 2. Budapest: HUN-REN Centre for Economic and Regional Studies.

detail.abstract: The European Union will introduce carbon pricing for the building and transport sectors in 2027. This policy shift will directly affect household expenses in member states, including Hungary. Understanding public attitudes toward carbon pricing is therefore critical to designing effective and socially acceptable climate policies. This policy brief presents the first study to examine public acceptance of, and willingness to pay (WTP) for, a carbon tax in a Central and Eastern European country. It also analyses the impact of a broad set of revenue recycling mechanisms on support – covering more options than previous international studies. Based on a nationally representative survey conducted in Hungary in the summer of 2022, the results reveal low public acceptance of, and WTP values for, a carbon tax, and limited increases in both acceptance and WTP when revenue recycling is introduced. All values are lower than those typically observed in Western European surveys. A unique finding is the relative popularity of allocating carbon tax revenues to health care and education – a preference not reported in earlier studies. The results underline the importance of thoroughly considering the distributional impacts of carbon pricing and of integrating strong social elements into climate policy design. Special attention should be paid to those who support carbon pricing only if revenues are recycled. To enhance public acceptability, this brief recommends (1) cutting taxes on energy alongside introducing carbon pricing with compensation for vulnerable groups, (2) legally earmarking carbon tax revenues for selected climate and social spending in underfunded areas, and (3) improving public understanding of climate change, the benefits of climate policy, and how carbon pricing works. The findings can inform Hungary’s Social Climate Plan, due by June 2025, which could unlock substantial EU funds to help mitigate the social impacts of carbon pricing.

AI.tldr: 欧盟将于2027年对建筑和交通部门引入碳定价政策，这将直接影响成员国（如匈牙利）的家庭支出。研究首次探讨了中欧和东欧国家对碳税的公众接受度和支付意愿，并分析了多种收入再分配机制对支持度的影响。结果显示公众接受度和支付意愿较低，且收入再分配对提升支持度作用有限。研究建议通过减税、明确收入用途和提高公众认知来提升政策接受度。
AI.research_question: 中欧和东欧国家（以匈牙利为例）的公众对碳税的接受度和支付意愿如何？收入再分配机制如何影响这种接受度？
AI.motivation: 碳定价政策对家庭支出有直接影响，了解公众态度对设计有效且社会可接受的气候政策至关重要。
AI.theoretical_framework: 碳定价政策、公众接受度理论、支付意愿理论、收入再分配机制。
AI.method: 基于2022年夏季在匈牙利进行的全国代表性调查。
AI.findings: 公众对碳税的接受度和支付意愿较低，收入再分配机制对提升支持度作用有限。公众偏好将碳税收入用于医疗和教育。
AI.theory_contributions: 首次在中欧和东欧国家研究碳税公众接受度，扩展了收入再分配机制的研究范围。
AI.practical_contributions: 为匈牙利的社会气候计划提供政策建议，包括减税、明确收入用途和提高公众认知。

title: How Do Supply Chain Pressures Affect Monetary Policy Transmission? *
affiliations: University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign - Department of Economics

detail.title: How Do Supply Chain Pressures Affect Monetary Policy Transmission? *
detail.abstract: This paper explores how supply chain pressures influence the transmission of monetary policy. I develop a novel firm-level supply chain pressure index using natural language processing on earnings call transcripts. Empirically, after an expansionary monetary policy shock, supply chain-pressured firms substitute away from constrained inputs and invest more in capital than their unpressured peers. At the sector level, high supply chain pressure is associated with a sharper and more persistent inflation response, with an overshoot lasting up to six quarters. I rationalize these findings using a New Keynesian model featuring supply chain frictions that reduce the effective inputs for production.

AI.tldr: 本文探讨了供应链压力如何影响货币政策的传导，通过自然语言处理构建企业级供应链压力指数，发现受压力企业在宽松货币政策下会转向替代投入并增加资本投资，行业层面则表现为更持久的高通胀。
AI.research_question: 供应链压力如何影响货币政策的传导？
AI.motivation: 理解供应链压力在货币政策传导中的作用，填补相关研究空白。
AI.theoretical_framework: 新凯恩斯主义模型，引入供应链摩擦以减少生产有效投入。
AI.method: 利用自然语言处理构建企业级供应链压力指数，并进行实证分析。
AI.findings: 受压力企业在宽松货币政策下转向替代投入并增加资本投资；行业层面表现为更持久的高通胀。
AI.theory_contributions: 扩展了新凯恩斯主义模型，引入供应链摩擦的理论框架。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者提供了供应链压力对货币政策传导影响的实证依据。

title: Reimagining Decentralized University Education in Africa: Toward a Scalable Framework for Industry-Linked Learning Hubs Inspired by ALU and CSA Rwanda
affiliations: African Leadership University, African Leadership University, African Leadership University and African Leadership University

detail.title: Reimagining Decentralized University Education in Africa: Toward a Scalable Framework for Industry-Linked Learning Hubs Inspired by ALU and CSA Rwanda
detail.abstract: This study investigates how decentralized, industry-linked learning hubs can address Africa's enduring higher education challenges of access, affordability, and employability. It proposes a scalable framework combining the African Leadership University (ALU)'s multi-city model with the Community Services Association (CSA) Rwanda's district-based learning ecosystem. The study is guided by three research questions: RQ1: What systemic enablers support the diffusion of industry-linked university hubs in Africa? RQ2: What key barriers limit diffusion, and how do they vary across countries? RQ3: How can proven models (e.g., ALU, CSA) be adapted and costed for scale? (2)Methodology. A qualitative comparative analysis was conducted using 35 high-credibility secondary sources filtered via a PRISMA-adapted protocol from an initial 245 records (2010-2025). Four cases-ALU, CSA, Ashesi University, and UNICAF-were analyzed through the lenses of Diffusion of Innovation, Triple Helix, and Experiential Learning theory. Although the study relies exclusively on secondary sources, we applied light-touch text-mining in MAXQDA: policy documents were tokenised, stop-words removed, and coded with an unsupervised LDA algorithm (k = 6) to surface latent themes that triaged sources for qualitative comparative analysis; no clustering or association-rule modelling was undertaken. Visual tools-including causal-loop diagrams, scorecards, and a Gantt-style scale-up roadmapsupported synthesis. (3) Findings. Five core enablers emerged: policy alignment, institutional autonomy, Triple Helix linkages, diversified finance, and contextualized curricula. Barriers included regulatory rigidity, funding fragility, governance gaps, and digital divides. The proposed Pan-African Learning Hub Framework blends ALU's experiential pedagogy with CSA's grassroots model, enabling vertical progression from districtlevel cooperatives to regional research hubs. A three-year scale-up plan (USD 400-4,000 per student/year) suggests viability under flexible policy conditions. (4) Research Limitations / Implications. Secondary-data reliance constrains causal attribution and excludes francophone/North African contexts. Field validation and financial modeling are recommended for future work. (5) Practical Implications. Policymakers and institutions can use this framework to pilot scalable, employment-linked hubs without constructing new campuses. (6) Originality / Value. This is the first study to align Africa-wide policy ambitions with operational design and costing of university-linked hub models.

AI.tldr: 本研究探讨了分散式、行业关联的学习中心如何解决非洲高等教育在可及性、可负担性和就业能力方面的长期挑战，提出了一个结合非洲领导力大学（ALU）多城市模式和卢旺达社区服务协会（CSA）地区学习生态系统的可扩展框架。
AI.research_question: 1. 支持行业关联大学中心在非洲扩散的系统性推动因素是什么？2. 限制扩散的关键障碍是什么，它们在不同国家间如何变化？3. 如何调整和成本核算已验证模型（如ALU、CSA）以实现规模化？
AI.motivation: 解决非洲高等教育在可及性、可负担性和就业能力方面的长期挑战。
AI.theoretical_framework: 创新扩散理论、三重螺旋理论和体验式学习理论。
AI.method: 采用定性比较分析，筛选35个高可信度二手资料，通过MAXQDA进行文本挖掘和主题提取。
AI.findings: 五个核心推动因素：政策一致性、机构自治、三重螺旋联系、多元化融资和情境化课程；障碍包括监管刚性、资金脆弱性、治理缺口和数字鸿沟。
AI.theory_contributions: 首次将非洲范围内的政策目标与大学关联中心模型的运营设计和成本核算相结合。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者和机构提供了一个无需新建校园即可试点可扩展、就业关联中心的框架。

title: Thermodynamic Justice in Space-Time: A Fluid Dynamics Framework for Haqq, Compensation, and Conscious Entropy Modulation
affiliations: Independent

detail.title: Thermodynamic Justice in Space-Time: A Fluid Dynamics Framework for Haqq, Compensation, and Conscious Entropy Modulation
detail.abstract: Imagine the universe as a giant, invisible ocean where everything-planets, people, thoughts, and even fairness-moves like waves in water. This paper builds on a scientific idea that the universe, called "spacetime," acts like a fluid with push and flow, explaining gravity and time (Mudassir, 2025). We extend this to show how unfair actions, like stealing, create ripples of chaos in this ocean, which the universe naturally smooths out to restore fairness, or "haqq" (your rightful share in Islam). Your thoughts, like prayers, and actions, like charity, guide these waves to bring balance. We also explain mysterious things, like unseen forces (jinn) or the calming power of mosques, as patterns in this ocean. A real example of a delayed $23,000 payment shows how this works in life. Using simple language, we explain all terms, connect to Islamic ideas like prayer (salah) and patience (sabr), and suggest ways to test these ideas, like seeing if prayer reduces stress. This paper is for everyone-scientists, students, or anyone curious about how fairness and spirituality fit with science.

AI.tldr: 本文基于‘时空如流体’的科学理论，探讨不公平行为如何引发宇宙中的涟漪效应，并通过思想和行动（如祈祷和慈善）恢复平衡。结合伊斯兰概念（如‘haqq’和‘sabr’），解释神秘现象并提出验证方法。
AI.research_question: 不公平行为如何在宇宙的流体模型中引发涟漪效应，并通过思想和行动恢复平衡？
AI.motivation: 探索科学与灵性（特别是伊斯兰教义）之间的联系，解释公平、神秘现象及其恢复机制。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于Mudassir（2025）的‘时空如流体’理论，结合伊斯兰教义中的‘haqq’（公平）、‘salah’（祈祷）和‘sabr’（耐心）等概念。
AI.method: 理论扩展与案例研究（如延迟支付的例子），并提出实验验证方法（如祈祷对压力的影响）。
AI.findings: 不公平行为在宇宙流体模型中产生混沌涟漪，而思想和行动（如祈祷和慈善）能引导宇宙恢复平衡。
AI.theory_contributions: 将科学理论与伊斯兰灵性结合，提出宇宙公平恢复机制的新视角。
AI.practical_contributions: 为个人提供通过祈祷和慈善促进公平的实际方法，并建议科学验证灵性效应的途径。

title: Opening call auction designs and price manipulation for price discovery: An experimental study
affiliations: Waseda University - School of Political Science and Economics, Waseda University and Waseda University, School of Political Science and Economics

detail.title: Opening call auction designs and price manipulation for price discovery: An experimental study
detail.abstract: This study investigates how different opening call auction designs affect price discovery and manipulation through laboratory experiments. The first design replicates major stock exchange openings, allowing order placements and cancellations before announcing the opening price. We alternatively investigate two call auction designs in which traders are not allowed to cancel orders during the session, while the call auction time is divided into sub-periods and orders are executed every sub-period before the opening price is announced. We first demonstrate that allowing cancellations leads to price manipulation, while restricting them or introducing periodic clearings significantly reduces manipulative behavior. Second, we find a gradual price discovery process in economies with and prohibiting cancellations. However, price discovery can be quickly achieved in periodic clearings. These results indicate that price manipulations and longer non-trading minutes result in slower price discoveries. Third, we show that reinforcement learning, by which traders attempt to find profitable strategies from past performances, explains the order choices of our lab participants, and thus, price manipulations and price discovery. Lastly, we develop an equilibrium model of an opening call auction, which predicts uniform price discovery and trend-following strategies in all three designs, but experimental results reveal that real traders act more strategically and adaptively, improving price discovery and enabling manipulation absent in the model. We contribute to the literature by emphasizing the significant role of reinforcement learning on price manipulations and the price discovery process under different opening call auction designs. Our study has important policy implications regarding which call auction design is better for the opening call market.

AI.tldr: 本研究通过实验探讨不同开盘集合竞价设计对价格发现和操纵的影响。研究发现，允许取消订单会导致操纵行为，而限制取消或引入定期清算能显著减少操纵。此外，价格发现在禁止取消或定期清算的设计中更快完成。强化学习解释了交易者的策略选择，而均衡模型未能完全预测实验中的行为。研究强调了强化学习在价格操纵和发现中的作用，并为开盘集合竞价设计提供了政策建议。
AI.research_question: 不同开盘集合竞价设计如何影响价格发现和操纵行为？
AI.motivation: 探讨开盘集合竞价设计对市场效率和操纵行为的影响，为政策制定提供依据。
AI.theoretical_framework: 强化学习理论、均衡模型、价格发现理论。
AI.method: 实验室实验，比较三种开盘集合竞价设计：允许取消订单、禁止取消订单、定期清算。
AI.findings: 允许取消订单导致操纵行为，限制取消或定期清算减少操纵；价格发现在禁止取消或定期清算设计中更快完成；强化学习解释了交易者策略选择。
AI.theory_contributions: 强调了强化学习在价格操纵和发现中的作用，补充了均衡模型的不足。
AI.practical_contributions: 为开盘集合竞价设计提供了政策建议，优化市场效率。

title: Bank Leverage Restrictions in General Equilibrium: Solving for Sectoral Value Functions
affiliations: Washington University in Saint Louis, John M. Olin Business School

detail.title: Bank Leverage Restrictions in General Equilibrium: Solving for Sectoral Value Functions
detail.abstract: This paper examines welfare effects of bank leverage restrictions. The Global Financial Crisis sparked rigorous debate on the appropriate leverage restriction to stabilize the banking sector without stunting it. I provide a methodological contribution for analyzing welfare effects of bank leverage ratio restrictions over the business cycle in a general equilibrium model with bank runs. This paper's contribution simplifies the model solution process, which is valuable given the model's realistic yet highly nonlinear and complex structure. This framework facilitates the analysis of the tradeoffs associated with bank capital requirements-while unlimited leverage allows capital to flow most freely to its most efficient users, limiting leverage through capital requirements reduces the probability of a bank run.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了银行杠杆限制对福利的影响，提出了一种在一般均衡模型中分析银行杠杆比率限制的方法，简化了模型求解过程。
AI.research_question: 银行杠杆限制对福利的影响是什么？
AI.motivation: 全球金融危机引发了对银行杠杆限制的讨论，如何在稳定银行业的同时不抑制其发展。
AI.theoretical_framework: 一般均衡模型与银行挤兑理论。
AI.method: 在一般均衡模型中分析银行杠杆比率限制，简化模型求解过程。
AI.findings: 限制杠杆通过资本要求降低了银行挤兑的概率，但无限制杠杆使资本更自由地流向高效使用者。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了一种简化复杂模型求解的方法。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者提供了分析银行资本要求权衡的框架。

title: Do markets react to weather? Stock price reactions to weather alerts
affiliations: Centre for Financial and Corporate Integrity, Coventry University and Centre for Financial and Corporate Integrity, Coventry University

detail.title: Do markets react to weather? Stock price reactions to weather alerts
detail.abstract: This paper examines the impact of weather alerts on stock prices. Using an event-study methodology, we show that the market responds negatively to weather alerts. This reaction is more pronounced when alerts indicate severe impact or involve multiple weather phenomena. Furthermore, firms operating in weather-sensitive industries as well as smaller, high-risk and high-growth firms listed on the junior growth market, experience significantly more negative stock returns. However, frequent updates about the alerts mitigate the negative market impact. Overall, the findings suggest that investors incorporate weather alerts into asset pricing, highlighting the importance of providing regular information during extreme weather events.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了天气警报对股票价格的影响，发现市场对天气警报反应负面，尤其是严重警报或多重天气现象时。天气敏感行业、小型高风险高增长公司受影响更大，但频繁更新警报信息可缓解负面影响。

title: Introducing LCOAI: A Standardized Economic Metric for Evaluating AI Deployment Costs
affiliations: Blend Tiger

detail.title: Introducing LCOAI: A Standardized Economic Metric for Evaluating AI Deployment Costs
detail.abstract: As artificial intelligence (AI) becomes foundational to enterprise infrastructure, organizations face growing challenges in accurately assessing the full economic implications of AI deployment. Existing metrics such as API token costs, GPU-hour billing, or Total Cost of Ownership (TCO) fail to capture the complete lifecycle costs of AI systems and provide limited comparability across deployment models. This paper introduces the Levelized Cost of Artificial Intelligence (LCOAI), a standardized economic metric designed to quantify the total capital (CAPEX) and operational (OPEX) expenditures per unit of productive AI output, normalized by valid inference volume. Analogous to established metrics like LCOE (levelized cost of electricity) and LCOH (levelized cost of hydrogen) in the energy sector, LCOAI offers a rigorous, transparent framework to evaluate and compare the cost-efficiency of vendor API deployments versus self-hosted, fine-tuned models. We define the LCOAI methodology in detail and apply it to three representative scenarios, OpenAI GPT-4.1 API, Anthropic Claude Haiku API, and a self-hosted LLaMA-2-13B deployment demonstrating how LCOAI captures critical trade-offs in scalability, investment planning, and cost optimization. Extensive sensitivity analyses further explore the impact of inference volume, CAPEX, and OPEX variability on lifecycle economics. The results illustrate the practical utility of LCOAI in procurement, infrastructure planning, and automation strategy, and establish it as a foundational benchmark for AI economic analysis. Policy implications and areas for future refinement, including environmental and performance-adjusted cost metrics, are also discussed.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种标准化的经济指标LCOAI，用于量化AI系统的全生命周期成本，并通过三种代表性场景验证其有效性。
AI.research_question: 如何准确评估AI部署的全面经济影响？
AI.motivation: 现有指标无法全面捕捉AI系统的生命周期成本，且缺乏跨部署模型的可比性。
AI.theoretical_framework: 借鉴能源领域的LCOE和LCOH指标，提出LCOAI框架。
AI.method: 定义LCOAI方法，并应用于OpenAI GPT-4.1 API、Anthropic Claude Haiku API和自托管LLaMA-2-13B部署。
AI.findings: LCOAI能够有效捕捉成本效益权衡，为采购、基础设施规划和自动化策略提供实用工具。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出LCOAI作为AI经济分析的基础性基准。
AI.practical_contributions: 为组织在AI部署中的成本优化和投资规划提供决策支持。

title: The Spillover Effects of Intellectual Property Theft: How Counterfeiting Accelerated China's Manufacturing Rise and Why Traditional Cost Estimates Are Grossly Undervalued
affiliations: Independent

detail.title: The Spillover Effects of Intellectual Property Theft: How Counterfeiting Accelerated China's Manufacturing Rise and Why Traditional Cost Estimates Are Grossly Undervalued
detail.abstract: This paper explores the pivotal role of intellectual property (IP) theft, particularly through counterfeiting, in propelling China's evolution from a producer of low-quality goods to a dominant force in global manufacturing, now accounting for approximately 30% of worldwide output. By synthesizing historical timelines, sector-specific alignments, economic quantifications, and recent 2025 data from sources like the OECD and USTR, we demonstrate how counterfeiting generated spillover benefits-including enhanced production volume, reverse engineering expertise, and iterative innovation-that accelerated China's industrial capabilities by an estimated 5-15 years in key sectors like electronics, batteries, apparel and footwear, pharmaceuticals, auto parts, and toys. Detailed case studies illustrate these dynamics, showing how illicit practices in each sector created hidden value ($50-200 billion per sector) through "learning by doing" and technology absorption, enabling transitions to legitimate dominance. Traditional valuations 2 of IP theft, which focus on direct revenue losses (e.g., $225-600 billion annually for the U.S.), grossly undervalue the harm by overlooking these spillovers, which amplify competitive advantages for the thief while imposing long-term economic displacements on victims, such as 2-5 million job losses in U.S. IP-intensive industries. Incorporating these effects could inflate global cost estimates by 2-3 times, reaching $1-3 trillion annually. The analysis draws implications for U.S. trade policy, suggesting escalated countermeasures like tariffs, reshoring incentives, and multilateral pressures to reclaim portions of the amplified losses. This study contributes to the literature by providing a comprehensive framework for assessing IP theft's dynamic impacts, with case studies offering granular evidence for policymakers.

AI.tldr: 本文探讨了知识产权（IP）盗窃（尤其是假冒）在中国从低质量产品生产国转变为全球制造业主导力量（占全球产量约30%）中的关键作用。通过历史时间线、行业对齐、经济量化和OECD等最新数据，研究发现假冒行为带来了溢出效应（如生产规模扩大、逆向工程能力和迭代创新），使中国在电子、电池等行业提前5-15年发展。传统IP盗窃估值低估了这些溢出效应，实际全球成本可能达1-3万亿美元/年。

AI.motivation: 传统IP盗窃估值仅关注直接收入损失，忽略了溢出效应（如技术吸收和竞争优势），导致对实际危害的低估。

AI.method: 综合历史时间线、行业对齐、经济量化（如OECD数据）和案例研究（电子、电池等行业）。
AI.findings: 假冒行为为中国带来50-2000亿美元/行业的隐藏价值，加速工业能力提升5-15年，全球成本可能达1-3万亿美元/年。

AI.practical_contributions: 为美国贸易政策提供建议（如关税、产业回流激励），帮助政策制定者量化实际损失并采取对策。

detail.title: Adaptation and Implementation of Spaced Learning Integrated with Technology (SLIT) Instructional Strategy and Students Academic Performance in Chemistry
detail.abstract: The study was on the adaptation of spaced learning integrated with technology (SLIT) instructional strategy and also investigated if the implementation of SLIT instructional strategy in chemistry classroom could improve students’ academic performance. A pretest, posttest, control group, quasi-experimental research design was adopted in this study. The instruments used for data collection was Chemistry Academic Performance Test (CAPT). SLIT lesson plans and CAPT were validated by two experts in Science Education. Kuder-Richardson (KR-21) formula was used to test internal consistency of CAPT which yielded a reliability value of 0.91. The population of the study was made up of 5,127 Senior Secondary 2 students offering chemistry in the 21-government approved secondary schools in the Aldo-Kola Local Government Area of Taraba State, Nigeria. A total of 124 students was purposively sampled from 4 schools out of 47 schools in the study area. Two research questions and three null hypotheses guided the study. The research questions were answered using Mean and Standard Deviation scores while the null hypotheses were tested using results from Analysis of Covariance (ANCOVA). The study revealed that there is a significant difference between SLIT instructional strategy and discussion method of teaching in favour of SLIT instructional strategy [F1, 123=98.765, p<0.05].  It was revealed that there is no significant interaction effect of treatments and gender on the mean academic performance scores of students i It was recommended among others that since SLIT instructional strategy was found to be effective Strategy for improving students’ academic performance irrespective of gender; Chemistry teachers should adopt the use of SLIT

title: Time to shrink the "disclosure gap" between private and public equity markets
affiliations: Independent and University of Oxford - Said Business School

detail.title: Time to shrink the "disclosure gap" between private and public equity markets

publicationDetails.detailsText: Research Handbook on the Structure of Private Equity and Venture Capital, editors de Fontenay, ED and Broughman, B; Edward Elgar Publishing, forthcoming.

detail.abstract: While the gap between private and public equity markets has been shrinking, the "disclosure gap" remains as wide as ever. We describe this disclosure gap, which we define as the difference between what has to be publicly disclosed in the two markets. Many believe the resulting status quo is optimal or close to it. We discuss three broad reasons why the status quo is in fact sub-optimal: agency problems in private equity which are comparable to those in public equity markets; poor outcomes including those resulting from "bankruptcy hardball"; and the free-riding advantage conferred on public markets. To address this we propose a modest level of mandatory public disclosure in private equity markets. They relate to Limited Partnership agreements, portfolio holdings, portfolio company accounts and return calculations. In each case the marginal financial cost of the proposed disclosure is negligible. We discuss possible objections to the proposals.

declarations.declarationOfInterest: The authors declare no competing financial or personal interests that could have appeared to influence the work reported in this paper.
declarations.ethicsApproval: The study relies exclusively on publicly available secondary financial data (S&P Capital IQ) for listed companies; no human participants, patient records, or proprietary personal data were involved. Therefore, institutional ethics approval was not required under the policies of University Of Wollongong Dubai.
declarations.funderStatement: This research received no external funding. All data collection, analysis, and manuscript preparation were conducted with the authors’ own resources.

detail.abstract:
Objective: This study examines the internal financial determinants of profitability among UAE-listed real-estate developers. A balanced panel of 42 firm-year observations for the seven largest publicly traded companies (2019-2024) is analysed, with return on assets (ROA) as the dependent variable and leverage, liquidity, operational efficiency, and firm size as explanatory factors. A Hausman specification test favors a cross-section random-effects estimator. The chosen model explains 66 % of the variation in ROA (weighted R-squared = 0.66; adjusted = 0.62) and reveals that higher operational efficiency significantly enhances profitability while greater leverage exerts a pronounced negative effect. Liquidity and firm size are positive but not statistically significant. By controlling for unobserved firm-specific and time-invariant heterogeneity, the random-effects framework provides robust evidence that capital structure and asset-utilization efficiency are the primary internal drivers of performance in the UAE real-estate sector.

Findings: The analysis shows that stronger operational efficiency is positively associated with return on assets, while heavier leverage is linked to lower profitability. Liquidity and firm size, by contrast, do not display a statistically meaningful relationship with ROA. These results are broadly in line with recent evidence on Gulf real-estate developers and reflect the sector’s heavy reliance on debt finance and its dependence on effective asset use.

Contribution: For practitioners, the findings underline two priorities. First, improving how existing assets are deployed through tighter cost control, shorter project cycles, or better inventory management which offers a dependable route to higher returns. Second, monitoring capital structure is crucial: excessive borrowing can undermine performance even when market conditions appear favorable. In comparison, simply accumulating cash or pursuing scale for its own sake delivers no clear profitability benefit; growth and liquidity policies should therefore be guided by project-level economics rather than balance-sheet size alone.

declarations.ethicsApproval: This study employed a qualitative descriptive research design and relied solely on documentary secondary sources, including scholarly journals, media reports, government policy documents, NGO publications, and international development records. detail.abstract: Insecurity remains one of the most pressing challenges undermining economic development in SouthEast Nigeria. This study focused on the post-2020 escalation of insecurity, marked by separatist agitations, sit-at-home orders, political unrest, targeted killings, and rising criminality. It explored the economic consequences of insecurity orchestrated by various actors and events specific to the region. The study examined six key themes: IPOB agitation, activities of the Eastern Security Network (ESN), attacks and assassinations by unknown gunmen, reprisal operations and abductions by government security forces, incidences of kidnapping, and attacks by killer herdsmen. A qualitative descriptive research design was adopted, utilizing thematic content analysis to examine data sourced from scholarly journals, media reports, government policy documents, NGO publications, and international development records. The study further employed SWOT and PESTEL frameworks to assess the strategic, social, political, and economic dimensions of insecurity and their implications for regional development. Findings revealed that insecurity has disrupted economic activity, weakened investor confidence, and constrained mobility and productivity across the SouthEast. While most forms of insecurity were found to negatively impact development, the activities of ESN appeared to offer localized protection in some areas. The study concludes that insecurity-if left unaddressed-will continue to hinder socioeconomic resilience in the region. It recommends a multi-stakeholder approach involving community engagement, institutional reform, and strategic policy interventions to restore peace and foster inclusive economic growth.
