title: From Costs to Contraction: The Impact of Supply-Side Inflation on Firms
affiliations: Université Paris 1 Panthéon-Sorbonne

detail.title: From Costs to Contraction: The Impact of Supply-Side Inflation on Firms

declarations.funderStatement: This work has been funded by a French government subsidy managed by the Agence Nationale de la Recherche under the framework of the Investissements d’avenir programme reference ANR-17-EURE-001.

detail.abstract: Using Natural Language Processing, I develop a firm-level forward-looking measure of supply-side inflationary pressure based on firms’ quarterly earnings conference call transcripts. Using Jordà’s local projections, I show that higher inflationary pressure predicts an increase in the cost ratio and a decline in margin in subsequent quarters. Most importantly, I find that firms reduce both tangible and intangible investment in response to higher inflationary pressures, and they never make up for the lost investment. This decline in investment leads to a smaller stock of tangible capital, intangible capital, firm size, and employee headcount. Moreover, I show that R&D investment is particularly sensitive to supply-side inflationary pressures due to its reliance on internal cash holding and cash flow. I find that higher inflationary pressure leads to lower patent filings in the long-term. These findings suggest that supply-side inflationary shocks have important adverse implications for economic growth.

detail.title: The Higher School of Economics and Business in Bukovina (RO) -A Growing and Well-Defined Academic Profile
detail.abstract: The historical region of Bukovina, located at the crossroads of Central and Eastern Europe, has long served as a space of cultural convergence and educational development. Shaped by a complex geopolitical past and a remarkable multiethnic coexistence, Bukovina has cultivated a distinct intellectual and social identity. In this context, the emergence and evolution of higher education institutions in the southern part of the region-now integrated into Suceava County (Romania)-reflect both the continuity of historical traditions and a strong commitment to the modernization of academic education. This article explores the development of higher economic education in Bukovina (Romania), which marks its 35th anniversary in 2025, with a focus on the Faculty of Economics, Administration, and Business within the "Ștefan cel Mare" University of Suceava. From its modest beginnings as a tourism study program to its current status as a robust academic and research institution, the study highlights the faculty's increasingly prominent role within regional and national academic communities. The article also examines the main research directions, institutional priorities, and strategic outlook, outlining the profile of a dynamic faculty with meaningful contributions to Romania's educational and economic landscape.

title: Monetary Policy’s Impact on Firms Facing Supply-Side Inflationary Pressure
affiliations: Université Paris 1 Panthéon-Sorbonne

detail.title: Monetary Policy’s Impact on Firms Facing Supply-Side Inflationary Pressure

declarations.funderStatement: This work has been funded by a French government subsidy managed by the Agence Nationale de la Recherche under the framework of the Investissements d’avenir programme reference ANR-17-EURE-001.

detail.abstract: I use a firm-level text-based measure of supply-side inflationary pressure, developed from firms’ earnings call transcripts, to conduct an event study that shows stocks under inflationary pressure are less responsive to monetary policy shocks, declining less after contractionary shocks and rising less after expansionary shocks. I find similar results using high-frequency market-level data: S&P 500 futures are less sensitive to monetary shocks when supply-driven inflation is high. Using Jordà’s local projections, I find that contractionary monetary policy has a negative effect on the cost of goods sold and a positive effect on the margins, investments, and asset size of firms experiencing larger supply-side inflationary pressure. These findings suggest that the adverse effects of tighter monetary policy are reduced when supply-side inflation is high. They also provide a novel explanation for the monetary policy price puzzle, highlighting that markets may respond less strongly to monetary policy shocks when supply-driven inflation is elevated. Finally, these results indicate a new transmission channel through which monetary policy can influence stock prices. These findings are important for the current policy discussions given the rising trend of supply-side pressures.

title: Hedging with memory: shallow and deep learning with signatures
affiliations: University of Paris 1 Pantheon-Sorbonne, Centre d'Economie de la Sorbonne (CES), Students and École Polytechnique, Paris - Centre de Mathématiques Appliquées (CMAP)

detail.title: Hedging with memory: shallow and deep learning with signatures
detail.abstract: We investigate the use of path signatures in a machine learning context for hedging exotic derivatives under non-Markovian stochastic volatility models. In a deep learning setting, we use signatures as features in feedforward neural networks and show that they outperform LSTMs in most cases, with orders of magnitude less training compute. In a shallow learning setting, we compare two regression approaches: the first directly learns the hedging strategy from the expected signature of the price process; the second models the dynamics of volatility using a signature volatility model, calibrated on the expected signature of the volatility. Solving the hedging problem in the calibrated signature volatility model yields more accurate and stable results across different payoffs and volatility dynamics.

declarations.declarationOfInterest: N/A
declarations.funderStatement: N/A

detail.abstract: Record linkage, the process of identifying and linking records that refer to the same entity across different data sources, is a critical challenge in data management and integration. Exact matching often fails due to data entry errors, inconsistencies in representation, and missing information, necessitating fuzzy matching techniques. This paper describes a configurable and extensible fuzzy matching system developed as an asp .net core web api. The system allows users to define granular, field-wise matching strategies through external configuration, including the selection of various fuzzy string comparison algorithms, individual field weighting, and custom preprocessing logic for specific data types. It provides detailed match outputs, including overall similarity scores, Soundex comparisons, and per-field comparison details, facilitating transparency and iterative refinement of matching rules. We discuss the architecture, core matching engine, API design, and performance optimization strategies such as dynamic blocking for cross-recordset comparisons. The framework aims to provide a practical and adaptable solution for developers needing to integrate fuzzy record linkage capabilities into .NET applications.

title: A practitioner's note about the antitrust community: A reflection of our economic and political system
affiliations: São Paulo Law School of Fundação Getulio Vargas FGV DIREITO SP

detail.title: A practitioner's note about the antitrust community: A reflection of our economic and political system
detail.abstract: The antitrust community is the group of people whose profession involves competition law. The existence of a public policy dedicated to market competition is what brings this cross-border community together. It is composed of competition authorities, competition lawyers, economic consultants, judges, international organisations, scholars, and specialised media, besides legislators, market players, NGOs, arbitrators and litigation funders. Due to its informality and decentralised nature, the boundaries of this community (i.e., who is in and out) are not always clear, but various social aspects highlight its existence. From common jargons and regular gatherings to leading voices that serve as reference in the field, its existence is as true a social reality as other epistemic groups. However, the profile of its members is highly heterogeneous and the impact of their work to society is extremely significant, although commonly unnoticeable to the eyes of many. This note describes this community, identifies its members, and explains how it relates to the broader economic and political system in which it is inserted. The conclusion is that the community has been in therapy, as a result of its role as both catalyser and subject of macropolitical debates, despite the technical nature of the field.

title: Understanding Ubuntu: Reclaiming Africa’s Moral Philosophy from Ideological Distortion
affiliations: Afrindependent Institute

detail.title: Understanding Ubuntu: Reclaiming Africa’s Moral Philosophy from Ideological Distortion
detail.abstract: Ubuntu, an African moral philosophy centered on solidarity, voluntary cooperation, and fraternal human relations, is often mischaracterized as socialist. This paper refutes that claim, exposing the ideological distortion that arises from conflating Ubuntu’s humane and peaceful nature with socialism’s coercive, confiscatory, and statist foundations. Far from endorsing centralized control or forced redistribution, Ubuntu emphasizes voluntary fraternity and respect for individual dignity, rooted in the African worldview of harmony and nonaggression. By disentangling Ubuntu from foreign ideologies such as socialism—a viciously coercive and oppressive Western import—this paper restores Ubuntu to its rightful place as a moral framework, not a political or economic doctrine underpinned by state aggression. The paper also highlights Africonomics as a more appropriate economic model for African societies, one that aligns with Ubuntu’s ethic of peace, natural rights, and voluntary cooperation.

AI.tldr: 本文反驳了将非洲道德哲学Ubuntu误认为社会主义的观点，澄清其强调自愿合作与个体尊严的本质，并提出了更适合非洲社会的经济模型Africonomics。

AI.theoretical_framework: 非洲道德哲学Ubuntu、社会主义理论、Africonomics经济模型。
AI.method: 理论分析与意识形态对比。

title: Present Value Growth Charts: A New Way to View Historical Investment Growth
affiliations: Retired -- No current affiliation

detail.title: Present Value Growth Charts: A New Way to View Historical Investment Growth
detail.abstract: Historical growth is most commonly displayed in what are referred to here as typical growth charts, i.e., as a charted time series of the values of an investment from its purchase on a date in the past through subsequent dates up to the present. Unfortunately, such charts have a number of shortcomings that can severely limit their value as a means of providing investors with a comprehensive, integrated, and possibly unbiased view of historical performance. This is especially true when they are used for assessing relative investment growth. The present paper introduces another type of growth chart that avoids those shortcomings while providing a different but meaningful and perhaps better view of investment performance. When used either in lieu of or supplemental to typical growth charts, it can offer additional critical insights into historical performance to those who want to take such information into account when making investment decisions.

detail.title: Prospero Theory: Behavioral Economics and Shakespeare

declarations.declarationOfInterest: N/A

detail.abstract: Prospect theory, a mainstay model of behavioral economics, was designed by Kahneman and Tversky (1979) to offer a better descriptive account of human decision making than that provided by rational choice theory -- and in many instances, it seems to deliver on its originators' goal. Descriptions of plausible human behavior, then, should generally accord well with the features of prospect theory. The writings of William Shakespeare -- an acclaimed observer of humanity -- provide a classic data set of human behavior that can be tested for its adherence to prospect theory. This paper explores Shakespeare's works, finding that the main elements of prospect theory-reference point dependence, loss aversion, and asymmetric gain/loss risk preferences are well represented within the Shakespeare canon. A second branch of behavioral economics, that examining happiness or "subjective wellbeing," also is reviewed in light of Shakespeare's works. Finally, Adam Smith, another acclaimed observer of humanity (who lived a little bit closer to Shakespeare's time than to ours), offers some parallel behavioral commentary, too.

title: Impact of Cash Transfer Program on Time-Use Patterns of Agricultural Households: Evidence from India
affiliations: Madras School of Economics and Madras School of Economics

detail.title: Impact of Cash Transfer Program on Time-Use Patterns of Agricultural Households: Evidence from India
detail.abstract: While many developing countries, including India, increasingly started using unconditional cash transfers in agriculture (UCTAs) to improve welfare of people, the effectiveness of such policies are still being evaluated.  Using data from the 2019 and 2024 NSSO’s Time Use Survey, this study aims to investigate the effects of a cash transfer program introduced in India on the time-use patterns of rural agricultural households. The program’s causal impacts are evaluated separately for both periods using a Seemingly Unrelated Regression to address cross-equation residual correlation. Additionally, to address selection bias, ATT has been estimated ignoring residual correlation. The 2019 findings show an initial trend towards more engagement in wage, coupled with a contraction in time spent on leisure. This pattern indicates an immediate response, possibly driven by short-term adjustments in labour supply. The 2024 estimates, show time-use pattern that is more sustained: households engage more time on leisure and, to a lesser extent, unpaid activities while spending less time on wage thus, prioritizing leisure activities.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了印度无条件现金转移支付（UCTAs）对农村农业家庭时间使用模式的影响，通过2019年和2024年的NSSO时间使用调查数据，采用SUR模型和ATT估计方法，发现短期和长期效应存在差异。

detail.abstract: In an era increasingly defined by the knowledge economy, effective Knowledge Management (KM) has emerged as a cornerstone for organizational success, innovation, and resilience. Particularly within the development and humanitarian sectors, KM enables organizations to maximize the value of intellectual capital, foster cross-functional collaboration, and deliver impactful results. This article presents a comprehensive overview of KM theory and practice, synthesizing insights from academic literature, books, and real-world applications from the United Nations (UN) and International Non-Governmental Organizations (INGOs). Core topics explored include the dichotomy between tacit and explicit knowledge, the foundational pillars of KM, strategic and operational frameworks, knowledge-sharing cultures, and tools for capacity building and measurement. The paper culminates in the proposal of an integrative KM framework tailored for global development agencies, offering a roadmap for sustainable knowledge-driven growth.

AI.tldr: 本文综述了知识管理（KM）的理论与实践，结合学术文献和联合国及国际非政府组织的实际案例，提出了一种适用于全球发展机构的综合KM框架。
AI.research_question: 如何为全球发展机构设计一个有效的知识管理框架以支持可持续的知识驱动增长？
AI.motivation: 在知识经济时代，有效的知识管理对组织成功、创新和韧性至关重要，尤其是在发展和人道主义领域。
AI.theoretical_framework: 文章探讨了隐性知识与显性知识的二分法、KM的基础支柱、战略与操作框架、知识共享文化以及能力建设和测量工具。
AI.method: 综合学术文献、书籍以及联合国和国际非政府组织的实际应用案例。
AI.findings: 提出了一个适用于全球发展机构的综合KM框架，为可持续的知识驱动增长提供路线图。
AI.theory_contributions: 整合了KM理论与实际应用，填补了全球发展机构领域的KM框架空白。
AI.practical_contributions: 为全球发展机构提供了可操作的知识管理框架，帮助其最大化智力资本价值并实现影响力成果。

title: Democratic Institutional Analysis: A Political Discretization Framework for Assessing Constitutional Governance
affiliations: Independent Scholar

detail.title: Democratic Institutional Analysis: A Political Discretization Framework for Assessing Constitutional Governance
detail.abstract: This paper introduces "political discretization" as a comprehensive framework for systematically assessing democratic institutional health and detecting early signs of constitutional governance erosion. Political discretization-the systematic fragmentation of continuous democratic processes into controllable categorical units-represents a measurable pattern of institutional capture that operates across multiple domains from early Christian authority conflicts to contemporary regulatory capture and digital platform manipulation. Building on Max Weber's authority typology and contemporary neuroscientific research demonstrating how partisan identity suppresses analytical thinking, this framework provides empirical tools for measuring discourse fragmentation, authority substitution, cognitive conditioning, and alternative suppression in real-time. Unlike subjective assessments of democratic backsliding, this methodology enables evidence-based early warning systems through systematic measurement of institutional capture mechanisms. The framework integrates established research methodologies from political communication analysis, neural pathway studies of political cognition, and historical patterns of epistemological colonization to create comprehensive assessment instruments. These tools measure: (1) media discourse quality through automated text analysis and complexity preservation indices; (2) congressional oversight effectiveness through constitutional adherence and institutional independence metrics; (3) regulatory capture resistance through authority substitution and transparency assessments; and (4) democratic input preservation through citizen influence and alternative perspective protection measures. For practitioners, this research provides immediately implementable measurement protocols for government oversight bodies, civil society organizations, and international democracy support agencies. The framework enables systematic monitoring of democratic institutional health, early detection of capture patterns, and evidence-based intervention strategies. For academics, it offers novel theoretical synthesis bridging classical political theory with contemporary empirical research while providing robust methodological tools for cross-national comparative analysis. The framework's validation through historical back-testing, cross-domain pattern recognition, and integration with established research methodologies positions it as a foundational tool for protecting constitutional governance in an era of systematic institutional pressure. Rather than relying on crisis response or partisan interpretation, democratic societies can now proactively monitor and protect their institutions through systematic measurement and evidence-based intervention.

AI.tldr: 本文提出“政治离散化”框架，用于系统性评估民主制度健康并检测宪法治理侵蚀的早期迹象。该框架结合韦伯权威类型学和神经科学研究，提供实时测量工具，支持基于证据的预警系统。
AI.research_question: 如何系统性测量民主制度健康并检测宪法治理侵蚀的早期迹象？
AI.motivation: 当前民主制度面临系统性侵蚀风险，需要客观测量工具而非主观评估。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于马克斯·韦伯的权威类型学和当代神经科学研究（党派身份抑制分析思维）。
AI.method: 结合政治传播分析、神经通路研究和历史模式，开发测量工具（如文本分析、国会监督指标等）。
AI.findings: 框架提供实时测量工具，支持早期检测和干预。
AI.theory_contributions: 连接古典政治理论与当代实证研究，提供跨学科理论综合。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政府、民间组织和国际机构提供可实施的测量协议和干预策略。

title: Integrating Behavioural Finance Into Strategic Investment Evaluation: A Fuzzy Logic
affiliations: Amity University Kolkata and affiliation not provided to SSRN

detail.title: Integrating Behavioural Finance Into Strategic Investment Evaluation: A Fuzzy Logic
detail.abstract: In the recent era of growing awareness, the investment decision making process is not only evaluated by the quantitative parameters but also the psychological constructs of the investors. This study attempts to apply the Fuzzy logic of Analytic Hierarchy Process to evaluate the investment strategies adopted by the individual. The Fuzzy Logic AHP model designed can be used by the analyst or the advisors to rank the strategies with respect to the multiple criteria that influence the investment decision making process. The study uses the Saaty Scale to convert the linguistic statements provided by the experts for the pair wise comparisons of the criteria and the investment strategies. The study suggests that Trading frequency has the maximum weights derived and followed by Asset Allocation. The AHP-FUZZY logic can be further extended by using other criteria and factors impacting the investment decision making process under different decision-making situations.

AI.tldr: 本研究应用模糊逻辑层次分析法（Fuzzy AHP）评估个人投资策略，发现交易频率权重最高，其次是资产配置。该方法可扩展用于其他投资决策场景。
AI.research_question: 如何利用模糊逻辑层次分析法评估个人投资策略？
AI.motivation: 随着投资决策中心理因素的重要性增加，需要一种结合定量与定性分析的方法来评估投资策略。
AI.theoretical_framework: 模糊逻辑层次分析法（Fuzzy AHP）和Saaty Scale。
AI.method: 使用模糊逻辑AHP模型，通过专家提供的语言陈述进行成对比较，评估投资策略。
AI.findings: 交易频率在投资策略中权重最高，其次是资产配置。
AI.theory_contributions: 扩展了模糊逻辑AHP在投资决策中的应用。
AI.practical_contributions: 为分析师和顾问提供了一种工具，用于在多标准下评估和排序投资策略。

title: Factors in the Illiquidity of Thinly Traded Securities
affiliations: University of Mississippi - Department of Finance, University of Mississippi and University of North Carolina Wilmington

detail.title: Factors in the Illiquidity of Thinly Traded Securities
detail.abstract: We examine liquidity factors in light of modern market dynamics, focusing on liquidity across thinly versus actively traded securities. We explore whether the liquidity gap identified by the SEC is a byproduct of trading volume or a more complex response to evolving market factors such as market fragmentation, adverse selection, inventory costs, and competition. We find that liquidity components have asymmetric effects, with thinly traded securities facing significantly higher execution costs, latency, and temporal fragmentation compared to actively traded stocks. Market fragmentation, exacerbates these inefficiencies for low-activity stocks, as liquidity becomes more fragmented and execution times increase. Furthermore, we show that competition among exchanges benefits high-activity stocks but has a detrimental impact on the execution quality of low-activity stocks, leading to larger quoted spreads and slower executions. Our findings suggest that liquidity disparities are not simply a function of trading volume but also reflect the impact of modern market dynamics.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了现代市场动态下的流动性因素，重点关注交易量稀疏与活跃证券之间的流动性差异。研究发现，流动性差异不仅是交易量的结果，还受到市场分割、逆向选择、库存成本和竞争等现代市场动态的影响。
AI.research_question: SEC识别的流动性差距是交易量的副产品，还是对现代市场动态（如市场分割、逆向选择、库存成本和竞争）的复杂反应？
AI.motivation: 探讨现代市场动态对流动性差异的影响，以揭示流动性差距的深层原因。
AI.theoretical_framework: 流动性理论、市场分割理论、逆向选择理论、库存成本理论和竞争理论。
AI.method: 实证分析，比较稀疏交易与活跃交易证券的流动性指标（如执行成本、延迟和时间碎片化）。
AI.findings: 稀疏交易证券的执行成本、延迟和时间碎片化显著高于活跃交易股票；市场分割加剧了低活跃度股票的流动性问题；交易所竞争对高活跃度股票有利，但对低活跃度股票的执行质量有负面影响。
AI.theory_contributions: 揭示了流动性差异的多维驱动因素，扩展了对现代市场动态影响流动性的理解。
AI.practical_contributions: 为监管机构和市场参与者提供了关于流动性差异的深入见解，有助于优化交易策略和监管政策。

title: Drowning in Disclosure: Information Overload and Investor Underreaction
affiliations: Krannert School of Management and Auckland University of Technology

detail.title: Drowning in Disclosure: Information Overload and Investor Underreaction
detail.abstract: This paper investigates whether textual density in corporate disclosures, proxied by the volume of machine-readable content in annual 10-K filings, predicts short-term stock returns. Using a comprehensive panel from 1994 through 2021, we sort firms into portfolios based on disclosure length and find that firms with higher information overload earn significantly lower returns in the subsequent month. The high-minus-low return spread ranges from −9.1% to −12.8% annually, controlling for standard risk factors. The effect is most pronounced among small-cap and growth firms, and in stocks with lower institutional ownership or belonging to disclosure-intensive industries. Our findings support the investor underreaction hypothesis, where information overload delays price adjustment, particularly where investor attention is limited. Robustness tests confirm that the effect is not subsumed by known factors. This study contributes to the asset pricing and disclosure literature by identifying a novel channel—disclosure density as a priced friction in financial markets.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了公司披露中的文本密度（以10-K年报中机器可读内容的体积为代理）是否能预测短期股票回报。通过1994年至2021年的面板数据，发现信息过载的公司在下个月获得显著较低的回报，年化回报差为-9.1%至-12.8%。
AI.research_question: 公司披露中的文本密度是否能预测短期股票回报？
AI.motivation: 探讨信息过载对股票回报的影响，验证投资者反应不足的假设。
AI.theoretical_framework: 投资者反应不足假设、信息过载理论。
AI.method: 使用1994-2021年的面板数据，按披露长度将公司分组，分析回报差异。
AI.findings: 信息过载的公司回报显著较低，年化回报差为-9.1%至-12.8%，尤其在小盘股、成长股、机构持股低的股票和披露密集型行业中表现明显。
AI.theory_contributions: 揭示了披露密度作为金融市场定价摩擦的新渠道。
AI.practical_contributions: 为投资者提供了信息处理效率的参考，帮助识别潜在的低效定价机会。

title: Defining Current and Expected Financial Constraints using AI: Reinterpreting the Cash Flow Sensitivity of Cash
affiliations: University of Birmingham - Birmingham Business School, University of Augsburg - Department of Economics, Durham University and University of Glasgow

detail.title: Defining Current and Expected Financial Constraints using AI: Reinterpreting the Cash Flow Sensitivity of Cash
detail.abstract: We propose a new approach to identify firm-level financial constraints by applying artificial intelligence to text of 10-K filings by U.S. public firms from 1993 to 2021. Leveraging transformer-based natural language processing, our model captures contextual and semantic nuances often missed by traditional text classification techniques, enabling more accurate detection of financial constraints. A key contribution is to differentiate between constraints that affect firms presently and those anticipated in the future. These two types of constraints are associated with distinctly different financial profiles: while firms expecting future constraints tend to accumulate cash preemptively, currently constrained firms exhibit reduced liquidity and higher leverage. We show that only firms anticipating financial constraints exhibit significant cash flow sensitivity of cash, whereas currently constrained and unconstrained firms do not. This calls for a narrower interpretation of this widely used cash-based constraints measure, as it may conflate distinct firm types-unconstrained and currently constrained-and fail to capture all financially constrained firms. Our findings underscore the critical role of constraint timing in shaping corporate financial behavior.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种利用人工智能分析美国上市公司10-K文件的新方法，以识别企业层面的财务约束。通过基于Transformer的自然语言处理技术，模型能够捕捉传统文本分类方法忽略的上下文和语义细节，从而更准确地检测财务约束。研究发现，当前和未来预期的财务约束对企业的财务行为有显著不同影响。
AI.research_question: 如何利用人工智能技术更准确地识别企业层面的财务约束？
AI.motivation: 传统文本分类方法在识别财务约束时可能忽略上下文和语义细节，导致准确性不足。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于Transformer的自然语言处理技术，结合财务约束理论。
AI.method: 利用人工智能分析1993年至2021年美国上市公司10-K文件。
AI.findings: 当前和未来预期的财务约束对企业的财务行为有显著不同影响，例如未来约束企业倾向于积累现金，而当前约束企业则流动性较低且杠杆较高。
AI.theory_contributions: 强调了财务约束时间点对企业财务行为的重要性，并提出了更精确的财务约束测量方法。
AI.practical_contributions: 为企业和管理者提供了更准确的财务约束识别工具，有助于优化财务决策。

title: Does Information about Legal Migration Pathways Reduce Irregular Migration Aspirations?
affiliations: RWI - Leibniz Institute for Economic Research, Kiel Institute for the World Economy, University of Kiel, University of Kiel, University of Orleans, Laboratoire d'économie d'Orléans and German Institute for Economic Research (DIW Berlin), Students

detail.title: Does Information about Legal Migration Pathways Reduce Irregular Migration Aspirations?

declarations.ethicsApproval: We obtained ethics approval from the Innovations for Poverty Action (IPA) IRB (protocol 16872) and the Comit´e National d’Ethique pour la Recherche en Santé (CNERS) Senegal (SEN22/76). The study was registered with a pre-analysis plan before the intervention (AEARCTR-0014299).
declarations.funderStatement: Funding was provided by the Leibniz Association's Collaborative Excellence Project "Senegal Migration Panel".

detail.abstract: Many high-income countries aim to both increase immigration in line with their labor market needs and decrease irregular arrivals, and some have explicitly promoted efforts to achieve the former as part of a solution to the latter. However, empirical evidence on how information about legal pathways shapes irregular migration intentions as well as self-selection and aspirations for mobility and qualification more broadly remains scant. We contribute new insights with a randomized controlled trial in rural Senegal, providing information and basic assistance on the U.S. Diversity Visa Lottery, which offers medium-and high-skilled migrants access to permanent residence. The intervention significantly increases migration intentions and shifts preferences toward legal pathways. However, currently ineligible individuals, particularly those already contemplating irregular migration, show increased interest in migrating irregularly, suggesting an unintended consequence of efforts to broadly promote legal migration options. Education aspirations only increase weakly from a high baseline. These aspirations already mostly surpass the requirements for pursuing a legal migration path, but participants are unable to realize them.

AI.tldr: 本文通过随机对照试验研究了合法移民途径信息对塞内加尔农村地区移民意向的影响，发现信息干预增加了合法移民意向，但也可能刺激不符合条件者的非法移民意愿。
AI.research_question: 合法移民途径的信息如何影响移民意向、自我选择及教育和流动愿望？
AI.motivation: 高收入国家希望通过增加合法移民满足劳动力需求并减少非法移民，但缺乏相关实证证据。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于移民决策理论和信息干预对行为影响的理论。
AI.method: 在塞内加尔农村进行随机对照试验，提供美国多元化签证彩票的信息和基本协助。
AI.findings: 信息干预显著增加合法移民意向，但也可能提高不符合条件者的非法移民意愿；教育愿望提升有限。
AI.theory_contributions: 填补了合法移民信息对移民意向影响的实证空白，揭示了信息干预的复杂效应。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者提供了合法移民信息推广可能带来的意外后果的警示。

title: A Structural VAR Model for the UK Economy
affiliations: Bank of England and Bank of England

detail.title: A Structural VAR Model for the UK Economy

publicationDetails.detailsText: Bank of England Macro Technical Paper No. 3

detail.abstract: We present a Structural VAR (SVAR) model for the UK economy, which is part of a wider modelling toolkit used to inform monetary policymaking. The model includes eight global and UK macroeconomic variables, and identifies a set of global and domestic shocks. We describe standard model outputs, including impulse responses, forecast-error variance decompositions, and historical decompositions. We then describe how the model can be used on a round-by-round basis to inform policy discussions by providing a structural narrative for forecast revisions.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种用于英国经济的结构性VAR（SVAR）模型，作为货币政策制定的工具之一。模型包含八个全球和英国宏观经济变量，并识别了一系列全球和国内冲击。
AI.research_question: 如何利用结构性VAR模型为英国经济提供货币政策制定的支持？
AI.motivation: 为货币政策制定提供更全面的建模工具，以更好地理解和应对全球及国内经济冲击。
AI.theoretical_framework: 结构性VAR（SVAR）模型及其在宏观经济分析中的应用。
AI.method: 构建包含八个全球和英国宏观经济变量的SVAR模型，识别冲击并分析其影响。
AI.findings: 模型能够生成脉冲响应、预测误差方差分解和历史分解等标准输出，为政策讨论提供结构性解释。
AI.theory_contributions: 扩展了SVAR模型在货币政策制定中的应用，提供了更全面的经济冲击识别方法。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者提供了实时支持，帮助解释预测修订和政策调整的结构性原因。

title: The Right Amount of Competition in Mobile Telecommunication – a Game Theoretic Framework
affiliations: Northwestern University - Department of Electrical Engineering and Computer Science and Northwestern University

detail.title: The Right Amount of Competition in Mobile Telecommunication – a Game Theoretic Framework
detail.abstract:
Ensuring adequate competition in mobile telecommunication is a basic policy goal addressed by regulators such as the FCC when designing auction rules or approving secondary transactions. Ensuring adequate competition is also the basic question when anti-trust authorities review mergers, such as the “4-to-3” merger in 2020 between Spring and T-Mobile in the U.S. A concern is that too much concentration can lead to a small number of firms exerting market power to decrease social welfare. However, in telecommunication, increased concentration may also lead to efficiency gains due to various scale effects. For example, Hazlett and Crandall (2024a) presents evidence that the Sprint/T-Mobile merger benefited consumers even though it led to fewer firms competing in the U.S. mobile market. This raises several basic questions. Does more concentration always benefit consumers and if not what effects determine the “optimal” number of competing firms in a market? How does this depend on the market size, the amount of bandwidth available or the scale effects that are at play?

In this work, we present a game theoretic framework to give insights into these questions. Our model is based on a framework for Cournot competition with congestion effects that has been used in a number of papers to study competition in wireless markets and other setting where users are sensitive to congestion effects. In these models, wireless service providers compete by determining a quantity of customers to serve. The price that they can then charge each customer is determined by a market clearing price as well as a congestion cost that depends on their spectrum holdings and the network infrastructure that they have deployed. This captures the fact the spectrum is a congestible resource and that customers care about quality of service so that they are not willing to pay as much for a network that offers a poorer quality of service. Our model captures several different scale effects. We account for the investment incentives of a service provider as a function of their bandwidth holdings, where a provider with more spectrum may see a larger return from investing in infrastructure. We also consider a congestion model that can capture “multiplexing gains” achieved by serving more users with proportionally more bandwidth. Finally, we also consider how operational cost may scale with an increasing number of users. We use this model to compare the economic welfare obtained under with different number of competing firms and different distributions of bandwidth. Our results show that the “optimal” number of firms can vary depending on these effects suggesting that policy makers need to carefully consider these effects when assessing competition.

AI.tldr: 本文探讨了移动通信市场中集中度对消费者福利的影响，提出了一种博弈论框架来分析市场集中度的最优水平。
AI.research_question: 市场集中度是否总是对消费者有利？如果不是，哪些因素决定了市场中的‘最优’竞争企业数量？
AI.motivation: 确保移动通信市场的充分竞争是监管机构的基本政策目标，但集中度可能带来效率提升，因此需要权衡。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于Cournot竞争模型，结合拥塞效应和规模效应。
AI.method: 博弈论框架，分析不同企业数量和带宽分配下的经济福利。
AI.findings: ‘最优’企业数量取决于多种效应，政策制定者需综合考虑。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了结合拥塞效应和规模效应的博弈论模型。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者评估市场竞争提供了理论依据。

title: ASSESSING WI-FI EXHAUSTION AND SHORTFALLS IN WI-FI CAPACITY
affiliations: The Brattle Group, The Brattle Group and The Brattle Group

detail.title: ASSESSING WI-FI EXHAUSTION AND SHORTFALLS IN WI-FI CAPACITY
detail.abstract: Wi-Fi is an essential component of modern connectivity and, therefore, of our modern economy. The vast majority of online activity traverses Wi-Fi networks, whether through mobile phones or through the diverse array of connected devices that permeate homes and businesses. Wi-Fi utilization is growing as our connected economy expands. As Wi-Fi utilization continues to expand, Wi-Fi congestion and ultimately “exhaustion” becomes a constraint to growth. This is characterized by an insufficient amount of Wi-Fi spectrum which can degrade the quality and reliability of a user's Wi-Fi experience.  This paper has analyzed the conditions under which Wi-Fi congestion and Wi-Fi spectrum exhaustion is expected today and is likely to occur in the near future in the absence of allocating more spectrum for Wi-Fi.

AI.tldr: 本文分析了Wi-Fi拥堵和频谱耗尽的现状及未来趋势，指出若不分配更多频谱，Wi-Fi体验将面临质量下降和可靠性问题。
AI.research_question: 在未分配更多频谱的情况下，Wi-Fi拥堵和频谱耗尽的现状及未来趋势如何？
AI.motivation: Wi-Fi是现代经济和连接的核心，但其拥堵和频谱耗尽可能限制增长并影响用户体验。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于Wi-Fi频谱利用和拥堵理论。
AI.method: 分析当前Wi-Fi使用情况和未来趋势。
AI.findings: Wi-Fi拥堵和频谱耗尽将导致用户体验质量下降和可靠性问题。

title: Socioeconomic and Geographic Determinants of Mexico’s Digital Divide
affiliations: University of Redlands, University of Redlands - School of Business and University of Redlands - School of Business

detail.title: Socioeconomic and Geographic Determinants of Mexico’s Digital Divide
detail.abstract: This paper studies the demographic, socioeconomic, and geographic dimensions of Mexico’s digital divide at the state level using the Spatially Aware Technology Utilization Model. Using this model, associations between twenty-two dependent indicators of ICT access and purposeful internet use are posited with thirteen independent variables – indicators of demographic, educational, economic, occupational attributes, technology training, and civil liberty. Geographic mapping reveals that there are considerable gaps and a clear north-south digital divide in Mexico, with coastal states and tourist hubs often leading the nation. K-means clustering reveals that very high to high levels of internet access and use clusters are in northern Mexican states of Baja California and Baja California Sur, and states bordering the U.S. The Federal District of Mexico including Ciudad de México (Mexico City), a hotspot of education and governance, has moderate level of internet access and use while the lowest levels are in central Mexico and southern states such as Guerrero, Oaxaca, and Chiapas. Regression analysis reveals that ICT access is positively associated with proportion of literate population age 15 and over. Internet use is inversely associated with young dependency ratio, positively associated with proportion of population which has received telecommunications training, and in some cases, with GDP per capita. Overall, these findings reinforce demographic and socioeconomic dimensions of Mexico’s digital divide. Based on these findings, Mexico can develop effective telecommunications policies to ensure equitable technology access and use, specifically to those in underserved states and communities.

AI.tldr: 本文使用空间感知技术利用模型研究了墨西哥数字鸿沟的人口、社会经济和地理维度，揭示了明显的南北差异，并提出了政策建议。
AI.research_question: 墨西哥各州的数字鸿沟在人口、社会经济和地理维度上有何表现？
AI.motivation: 研究墨西哥数字鸿沟的现状及其影响因素，为制定公平的电信政策提供依据。
AI.theoretical_framework: 空间感知技术利用模型（Spatially Aware Technology Utilization Model）。
AI.method: 使用K-means聚类和回归分析，结合22个ICT访问指标和13个独立变量。
AI.findings: 墨西哥数字鸿沟呈现明显的南北差异，北部和沿海地区ICT访问和使用水平较高，而中部和南部较低；教育水平、GDP等因素与ICT访问和使用显著相关。
AI.theory_contributions: 验证了人口和社会经济因素对数字鸿沟的影响，扩展了空间感知模型的应用。
AI.practical_contributions: 为墨西哥制定针对性的电信政策提供了数据支持，重点关注欠发达地区的技术公平。

title: Overconfident Bank CEOS: Risk Amplification Amid Economic Policy Uncertainty?
affiliations: Utrecht University, University of Newcastle - Newcastle University Business School and University of Zurich

detail.title: Overconfident Bank CEOS: Risk Amplification Amid Economic Policy Uncertainty?
detail.abstract: We examine whether overconfident bank CEOs attenuate or amplify risk exposure amid heightened economic policy uncertainty (EPU). Consistent with risk amplification channel, we find that banks led by overconfident CEOs exhibit nearly 9.1% higher risk during periods of high EPU relative to their peers. Further analyses suggest that overconfident CEOs fuel risk through aggressive credit extension and inadequate loan loss provisioning, leading to higher loan impairments and eroded bank performance

AI.tldr: 研究发现，在经济政策不确定性（EPU）高企时期，过度自信的银行CEO会通过激进的信贷扩张和不足的贷款损失准备金增加银行风险，导致贷款损失增加和银行绩效下降。
AI.research_question: 过度自信的银行CEO在经济政策不确定性高企时期是缓解还是加剧银行的风险暴露？
AI.motivation: 探讨CEO过度自信对银行风险管理的实际影响，尤其是在经济政策不确定性高的环境下。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于行为金融学理论，特别是过度自信理论，分析CEO决策对银行风险的影响。
AI.method: 通过实证分析，比较不同CEO领导下的银行在EPU高企时期的风险表现。
AI.findings: 过度自信的CEO领导的银行在EPU高企时期风险增加9.1%，主要由于激进的信贷策略和不足的贷款损失准备金。
AI.theory_contributions: 丰富了行为金融学在银行风险管理中的应用，验证了CEO过度自信对风险放大的作用。
AI.practical_contributions: 为银行董事会和监管机构提供了关于CEO性格特征对银行风险影响的实证依据。

title: Decompositions, forecasts and scenarios from an estimated DSGE model for the UK economy
affiliations: Bank of England, Bank of England, Bank of England, Bank of England, Bank of England, Bank of England and Bank of England

detail.title: Decompositions, forecasts and scenarios from an estimated DSGE model for the UK economy

publicationDetails.detailsText: Bank of England Macro Technical Paper No. 1

detail.abstract: We describe a medium-scale, open-economy dynamic stochastic general equilibrium model of the UK economy, which has its foundations in ‘COMPASS’, the Bank of England’s ‘Central Organising Model for Projection Analysis and Scenario Simulation’ described in Burgess et al (2013). The model we describe is augmented to include imported energy goods in production and consumption, time-varying trends, an expanded set of economic shocks and real adjustment costs. We parametrise the model via a mix of calibration and full-information Bayesian estimation. The model can match key moments in the UK data and aligns well with salient empirical impulse response functions. The model is part of a broader suite used to inform the monetary policy process at the Bank of England, and it can be used in a range of ways. In this paper, we explain how the model can be applied to produce structural decompositions, forecasts and counterfactual scenarios.

AI.tldr: 本文描述了一个中等规模的开放经济动态随机一般均衡模型，基于英格兰银行的‘COMPASS’模型，并扩展了能源进口、时变趋势、经济冲击和实际调整成本。模型通过校准和贝叶斯估计参数化，能匹配英国数据的关键时刻，并用于货币政策分析和情景模拟。
AI.research_question: 如何构建一个适用于英国经济的动态随机一般均衡模型，并用于货币政策分析和情景模拟？
AI.motivation: 为英格兰银行的货币政策过程提供支持，扩展现有模型以更好地反映经济现实。
AI.theoretical_framework: 动态随机一般均衡（DSGE）模型，基于‘COMPASS’框架。
AI.method: 混合校准和全信息贝叶斯估计方法。
AI.findings: 模型能匹配英国数据的关键时刻，并与实证脉冲响应函数一致。
AI.theory_contributions: 扩展了DSGE模型的应用范围，增加了能源进口和时变趋势等现实因素。
AI.practical_contributions: 为货币政策制定提供结构分解、预测和反事实情景分析工具。

title: The Death of Distance: Internet and Political Trust in Africa
affiliations: Université Panthéon-Assas (Paris II) - Laboratoire d'économie mathématique et de microéconomie appliquée and Université de Paris

detail.title: The Death of Distance: Internet and Political Trust in Africa
detail.abstract: This paper shows that internet use reduces spatial disparities in political trust within Sub-Saharan African countries. We combine geocoded surveys across 17 countries (2013-2021) with mobile internet coverage data. First, we use a border discontinuity design comparing ethnic groups divided by national boundaries to show that remote citizens report higher political trust than those near capital cities. Then, we estimate how internet use interacts with distance from capital to affect political trust, adopting two instrumental variable strategies using 3G coverage and lightning strike frequency. We find that internet use reduces the distance trust relationship by cutting information costs. Remote citizens become more critical, aligning with opinions typically found near capitals. The effects are stronger in countries with high corruption and where governments capture traditional media. These changes translate into increased demand for political accountability and reduced electoral support for incumbents.

AI.tldr: 互联网使用减少了撒哈拉以南非洲国家政治信任的空间差异，通过降低信息成本使偏远地区公民更接近首都地区的政治观点。
AI.research_question: 互联网使用如何影响撒哈拉以南非洲国家政治信任的空间差异？
AI.motivation: 研究互联网对政治信任的影响，特别是在信息获取受限的偏远地区。
AI.theoretical_framework: 信息成本理论、政治信任理论。
AI.method: 结合地理编码调查和移动互联网覆盖数据，采用边界间断设计和工具变量策略（3G覆盖和闪电频率）。
AI.findings: 互联网使用减少了政治信任与距离的关系，偏远地区公民政治观点更接近首都地区，尤其在腐败高和政府控制传统媒体的国家。
AI.theory_contributions: 验证了信息成本对政治信任的影响，扩展了互联网与政治行为的研究。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者提供了通过互联网提升政治透明度和问责制的依据。

title: From Photon to Parliament: How Meaning Emerges in Biology and Infrastructure
affiliations: University of Birmingham

detail.title: From Photon to Parliament: How Meaning Emerges in Biology and Infrastructure
detail.abstract: This essay explores the emergence of meaning in two complex domains: biological perception and infrastructure governance. Beginning with the photon's journey through the visual system, we show how energy becomes experience through layered, adaptive processes. We then turn to infrastructure investment, where monetary inputs-like photons-must traverse social systems to yield meaning. Cost-benefit analysis (CBA) may measure value, but it cannot anticipate emergence. By comparing energy-to-meaning in biology with money-to-meaning in infrastructure, we reveal how complexity disrupts scalar currencies and demands a new politics-one attuned to history, coherence, and the dynamic construction of meaning.

AI.tldr: 本文探讨了生物感知和基础设施治理两个复杂领域中意义的涌现。从光子通过视觉系统的旅程开始，展示了能量如何通过分层的适应性过程转化为经验。接着转向基础设施投资，指出货币输入（如光子）需通过社会系统才能产生意义。成本效益分析（CBA）可以衡量价值，但无法预测涌现。通过比较生物学中能量到意义与基础设施中货币到意义的转化，揭示了复杂性如何打破标量货币，并需要一种新的政治——关注历史、连贯性和意义的动态构建。
AI.research_question: 在生物感知和基础设施治理中，意义是如何从能量或货币输入中涌现的？
AI.motivation: 探讨复杂系统中意义的动态构建过程，并揭示标量货币（如能量或货币）如何通过适应性过程转化为有意义的经验或社会价值。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于复杂系统理论和适应性过程理论，结合生物学感知和社会治理的跨学科视角。
AI.method: 通过比较生物学中的能量转化过程与基础设施治理中的货币转化过程，分析意义的涌现机制。
AI.findings: 复杂性打破了标量货币的直接转化，意义的涌现需要关注历史、连贯性和动态构建过程。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了意义涌现的跨学科理论框架，强调了复杂系统中适应性过程的重要性。
AI.practical_contributions: 为基础设施治理提供了新的视角，指出成本效益分析的局限性，并呼吁关注动态意义构建的政治策略。

title: Distributed Games With Jumps: An Α-Potential Game Approach
affiliations: University of California, Berkeley - Department of Industrial Engineering and Operations Research, University of California, Berkeley - Department of Industrial Engineering & Operations Research (IEOR) and Imperial College London - Department of Mathematics

detail.title: Distributed Games With Jumps: An Α-Potential Game Approach
detail.abstract: Motivated by game-theoretic models of crowd motion dynamics, this paper analyzes a broad class of distributed games with jump diffusions within the recently developed α-potential games framework. We demonstrate that analyzing the α-Nash equilibria is equivalent to solving finite-dimensional control problems. Beyond the viscosity and verification characterizations for the general games, we explicitly and in detail examine how spatial population distributions and interaction rules influence the structure of α-Nash equilibria in these distributed settings, and in particular for crowd motion games. Our theoretical results are supported by numerical implementations using policy gradient-based algorithms, further demonstrating the computational advantages of the α-potential game framework in computing Nash equilibria for general dynamic games.

AI.tldr: 本文基于博弈论模型研究群体运动动力学，利用α-势博弈框架分析了一类具有跳跃扩散的分布式博弈，证明了α-纳什均衡的求解等价于有限维控制问题，并通过数值实验验证了理论结果的优越性。
AI.research_question: 如何在α-势博弈框架下分析具有跳跃扩散的分布式博弈的α-纳什均衡？
AI.motivation: 受群体运动动力学的博弈论模型启发，研究分布式博弈中α-纳什均衡的性质及其计算优势。
AI.theoretical_framework: α-势博弈框架、跳跃扩散理论、纳什均衡理论。
AI.method: 理论分析结合数值实验（基于策略梯度的算法）。
AI.findings: α-纳什均衡的求解可转化为有限维控制问题；空间分布和交互规则显著影响均衡结构。
AI.theory_contributions: 扩展了α-势博弈框架在动态博弈中的应用，提供了均衡求解的新视角。
AI.practical_contributions: 为分布式动态博弈的均衡计算提供了高效算法支持。

reference: https://www.taylorfrancis.com/books/edit/10.4324/9781003381020/marcusean-mind-eduardo-altheman-santos-jina-fast-nicole-mayberry-sid-simpson
title: Law & Order: Rethinking Marcuse's Legacy for Abolitionist Politics
affiliations: Boston College - Law School

detail.title: Law & Order: Rethinking Marcuse's Legacy for Abolitionist Politics
detail.abstract: This chapter offers a novel interpretation of an important phrase in Marcuse’s work: “law and order.” For Angela Davis, Marcuse’s analysis of law and order reveals the importance of language for abolitionist politics. By contrast, I show that law and order, in Marcuse’s writings, generally refers to socially necessary repression. This reconceptualization of law and order harbors several important Marcusean insights for contemporary abolitionism. Crucially, it reveals that the abolitionist movement does not oppose law and order as such. Rather, its endeavor to supplant prisons and policing with life-affirming institutions means to transform the basic mechanisms of social repression, thereby realizing an emancipatory law and order. With Marcuse, we can recapture law and order from its conservative appropriation and restore it, as bequest, to our contemporary, abolitionist imaginary.

AI.tldr: 本章对马尔库塞著作中的“法律与秩序”进行了新解读，指出其通常指社会必要的压制，而非废除主义政治所反对的对象。通过重新定义，为当代废除主义提供了重要见解。
AI.research_question: 马尔库塞著作中‘法律与秩序’的真正含义及其对当代废除主义的意义是什么？
AI.motivation: 探讨马尔库塞对‘法律与秩序’的独特理解，以揭示其对废除主义运动的潜在贡献。
AI.theoretical_framework: 马尔库塞的社会批判理论，特别是关于社会压制与解放的观点。
AI.method: 文本分析，解读马尔库塞著作中‘法律与秩序’的用法及其语境。
AI.findings: ‘法律与秩序’在马尔库塞著作中指社会必要的压制，废除主义的目标是转变压制机制，而非完全否定法律与秩序。
AI.theory_contributions: 重新定义了‘法律与秩序’，为废除主义提供了新的理论基础。
AI.practical_contributions: 为废除主义运动提供了策略方向，即通过转变社会机制实现解放目标。

title: Par for the Course: Did the Bank Term Funding Program (BTFP) Support Credit Intermediation?
affiliations: University of South Carolina - Darla Moore School of Business, Office of the Comptroller of the Currency and Federal Reserve Bank of Philadelphia

detail.title: Par for the Course: Did the Bank Term Funding Program (BTFP) Support Credit Intermediation?
detail.abstract: Regulators addressed the 2023 Regional Banking Crisis by using the systemic risk exception to back uninsured depositors and launching the Bank Term Funding Program (BTFP), which accepted eligible collateral at par without charging a penalty rates, effectively subsidizing banks with unrealized losses. We develop a design-based method to estimate BTFP's effect on credit intermediation. We find that BTFP loans replaced expensive deposits and mitigated potential credit collapses while adjusting credit composition between loans and commitments. Our findings highlight challenges of jointly analyzing banking crises and crisis-policy interventions and provide insights for designing future emergency lending and liquidity facilities.

AI.tldr: 本文通过设计方法评估了2023年区域银行危机中银行定期融资计划（BTFP）对信贷中介的影响，发现BTFP贷款替代了高成本存款并缓解了信贷崩溃风险，同时调整了贷款与承诺的信贷组合。
AI.research_question: 银行定期融资计划（BTFP）如何影响信贷中介？
AI.motivation: 2023年区域银行危机中，监管机构通过系统性风险例外支持未保险存款人并启动BTFP，但政策效果尚不明确。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于设计的方法用于评估政策干预对信贷市场的影响。
AI.method: 设计方法用于估计BTFP对信贷中介的效应。
AI.findings: BTFP贷款替代了高成本存款，缓解了信贷崩溃风险，并调整了信贷组合。
AI.theory_contributions: 为分析银行危机与政策干预的联合效应提供了方法论支持。
AI.practical_contributions: 为未来紧急贷款和流动性设施的设计提供了参考。

title: Globalization of Accounting Standards and Treatment of Distributable Profits: Implications on Behaviors of Managements in Japan
affiliations: Keio University - Graduate School of System Design and Management and University of Tokyo

detail.title: Globalization of Accounting Standards and Treatment of Distributable Profits: Implications on Behaviors of Managements in Japan

declarations.funderStatement: Grant-in-Aid was provided by National Institute of Informatics in Japan, Research Project Number 25380588 (from April 2013 to March 2016)

publicationDetails.detailsText: Tohoku Economics Research Group Discussion Paper No. 313, Tohoku University, March 2014

detail.abstract: In recent times, the move towards globalization of accounting standards has been rapid. On the other hand, related accounting systems, like those for corporate laws, taxation laws, and capital market regulations, are still at the discretion of each country; hence, we do not expect material action towards their convergence globally. The purpose of this paper is to examine how financial accounting can be synchronized with these related systems in Japan, especially corporate laws, as the two have always been closely related. In this respect, we examined the experiences of other countries, particularly the U.S., the U.K. and France, since they are the most appropriate examples of how to deal with distributable profits reflecting international accounting standards like International Financial Reporting Standards (IFRS). We also discuss the effect of the possible change of treatment distributable profits under global accounting standards on behaviors of managements. Considering the financial environment, the Japanese government will need to emulate the European countries, seeking insights into the depth and breadth of the issues of the globalization of accounting standards and accounting principles of corporate laws. Thus, the experiences of other countries will be good examples for Japan in the coming future.

AI.tldr: 本文探讨了日本如何将财务会计与相关系统（如公司法）同步，借鉴了美国、英国和法国的经验，并讨论了全球化会计准则对管理层行为的影响。
AI.research_question: 日本如何将财务会计与相关系统（如公司法）同步？
AI.motivation: 全球化会计准则快速发展，但相关会计系统（如公司法、税法等）仍由各国自主决定，需研究如何协调。
AI.theoretical_framework: 国际财务报告准则（IFRS）及其与公司法的关系。
AI.method: 通过比较研究美国、英国和法国的经验。
AI.findings: 日本需借鉴欧洲国家的经验，解决全球化会计准则与公司法的协调问题。
AI.theory_contributions: 为全球化会计准则与本地法律系统的协调提供了理论支持。
AI.practical_contributions: 为日本政府制定政策提供了参考，帮助管理层适应全球化会计准则的变化。

title: From the Meta-Vacuum to Consciousness: Informational Primacy and the Evolution of Reality's Structures
affiliations: Zhytomyr Polytechnic State University

detail.title: From the Meta-Vacuum to Consciousness: Informational Primacy and the Evolution of Reality's Structures
detail.abstract: This two-part article presents a radically new model of reality, grounded in the idea that information—rather than matter, energy, or even space-time—constitutes the most fundamental substrate of existence. We begin with a conceptual shift: rather than treating the Big Bang as the ultimate beginning, we propose a deeper “informational rupture” in a preexisting “meta-vacuum” state, giving rise to multiple potential branches or phases of reality. One of these branches manifests as our familiar Universe, yet others may remain hidden or manifest indirectly via phenomena attributed to dark matter, dark energy, or quantum nonlocality. In Part One, we develop the axiomatic and mathematical foundations of this informational approach. We introduce a parametric space ΛΛ, an “operator control room” of informational states, and define how branches can emerge from phase transitions in the meta-vacuum. The standard physical laws—space, time, fields, forces—are shown to be effective consequences of deeper informational processes. We also discuss how this viewpoint resonates with key ideas in quantum gravity, the holographic principle, and string theory. In Part Two, we explore how informational complexity evolves to generate higher levels of structure—leading from elementary particles and atoms to stars, galaxies, and biological life. Here, we propose that chemical, biological, and cognitive laws also arise as “layered” manifestations of the same informational foundation. Life and consciousness become natural outgrowths of informational dynamics, with each level introducing new effective principles that build upon (but do not contradict) underlying quantum and astrophysical laws. This model unifies multiple perspectives from quantum mechanics, cosmology, evolutionary biology, and cognitive science under a single principle of informational primacy. It suggests that physical laws, the emergence of life, the development of consciousness, and cultural evolution can be viewed as stages of continually increasing informational organization. Finally, we outline possible future directions, including toy-model simulations, connections to modern theories of quantum gravity, and interdisciplinary research bridging physics, information science, biology, and philosophy.

AI.tldr: 这篇论文提出了一个全新的现实模型，认为信息是最基本的存在基础，而非物质、能量或时空。作者提出了一种“信息断裂”的概念，取代传统的“大爆炸”理论，并探讨了信息如何生成宇宙的多重分支。论文分为两部分：第一部分建立了信息方法的数学基础，第二部分探讨了信息复杂性如何演化出更高层次的结构，如生命和意识。
AI.research_question: 信息是否是最基本的存在基础？如何通过信息理论解释宇宙的多重分支及其演化？
AI.motivation: 传统物理学将物质、能量或时空视为基本存在基础，但作者认为信息可能更为根本，并试图通过信息理论统一量子力学、宇宙学、生物学和认知科学。
AI.theoretical_framework: 信息理论、量子引力、全息原理、弦理论、相变理论。
AI.method: 提出了一种基于信息的数学模型，定义了参数空间ΛΛ作为信息状态的“操作控制室”，并通过相变理论解释宇宙分支的生成。

title: The Economic Impact of Instant Payments and Dollar-Linked Digital Currencies in the U.S
affiliations: Johns Hopkins University SAIS

detail.title: The Economic Impact of Instant Payments and Dollar-Linked Digital Currencies in the U.S
detail.abstract: This paper examines the macroeconomic and financial implications of scaling instant payments in the United States, whether through public infrastructure or private alternatives such as stablecoins. While the transactional advantages of speed and cost reduction are well established, the broader economic consequences of real-time settlement remain underexplored. Focusing on high-value transactions such as B2B payments, this study investigates how accelerated settlement may affect liquidity, productivity, financial stability, inflation, fiscal enforcement, and fraud exposure. Drawing on international case studies, economic theory, and original quantitative estimates, the analysis finds that settlement delays currently immobilize up to $3.4 trillion in working capital. This generates an estimated opportunity cost of $171 billion per day, borne primarily by businesses in the form of short-term financing costs to bridge payment lags. Additionally, the paper estimates that long-term displacement of card-based payments by lower-cost instant payment methods may affect inflation dynamics and reduce consumer prices by 0.11 to 0.56 percentage points, depending on instant payment adoption and market structure. While these projections highlight material economic effects, they warrant further empirical validation. The analysis also underscores the importance of mitigating emerging risks such as financial fraud. The paper concludes with policy recommendations for U.S. regulators, emphasizing the need for interoperability, institutional mandates, and infrastructure investment to unlock the full economic benefits of instant payments.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了美国推广即时支付（无论是通过公共基础设施还是私人替代方案如稳定币）的宏观经济和金融影响。研究发现，即时支付可能释放高达3.4万亿美元的流动资金，减少企业短期融资成本，并可能降低消费者价格0.11至0.56个百分点。同时，需注意金融欺诈等风险。
AI.research_question: 推广即时支付对美国宏观经济和金融的广泛影响是什么？
AI.motivation: 即时支付的速度和成本优势已被广泛认可，但其对经济（如流动性、生产力、金融稳定等）的更深层次影响尚未充分研究。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于国际案例研究、经济理论和原创定量估计。
AI.method: 结合国际案例研究、经济理论和定量分析。
AI.findings: 即时支付可能释放3.4万亿美元流动资金，减少企业短期融资成本1710亿美元/天，并可能降低消费者价格0.11至0.56个百分点。
AI.theory_contributions: 填补了即时支付对宏观经济和金融影响的研究空白，提出了定量估计框架。
AI.practical_contributions: 为美国监管机构提供了政策建议，强调互操作性、机构授权和基础设施投资的重要性。

title: The Electoral Consequences of Natural Disasters: A Dynamic Fixed-Effects Analysis
affiliations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey - Rutgers University, Newark

detail.title: The Electoral Consequences of Natural Disasters: A Dynamic Fixed-Effects Analysis
detail.abstract: With the increasing frequency of major natural disasters, understanding their political consequences is of paramount importance for democratic accountability. The existing literature is deeply divided, with some studies finding that voters punish incumbents for disaster-related damages, while others find they reward them for relief efforts. This paper investigates the electoral consequences of natural disasters for incumbent mayors, broader electoral dynamics, and the long-term political ambition of officeholders. The study leverages a comprehensive panel dataset of over 10,000 candidate-election observations in U.S. mayoral races from 1989 to 2021, combining detailed election data with a global registry of disaster events. To identify causal effects, the analysis employs a robust dynamic two-way fixed-effects event-study design, validated by extensive pre-trend and placebo tests. The findings reveal that the electoral impact of disasters is highly conditional on their timing. A disaster that strikes in the same quarter as an election provides a significant electoral boost to incumbents, increasing their vote share by over 6 percentage points. However, disasters consistently suppress voter turnout, reducing it by an average of 1.4 percentage points. In a novel finding, the analysis demonstrates that the experience of managing a disaster significantly increases an incumbent's likelihood of seeking re-election in the subsequent cycle by as much as 12 percentage points. These findings help reconcile conflicting theories of retrospective voting by highlighting the critical role of voter myopia and salience. They also reveal a previously undocumented channel through which crises shape political careers, suggesting that disaster management is not only a test of governance but also a catalyst for political ambition.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了自然灾害对现任市长选举结果、选民投票率及官员政治抱负的影响，发现选举季的灾害会显著提高现任者的得票率，但降低选民投票率，同时增加官员寻求连任的意愿。
AI.research_question: 自然灾害对现任市长选举结果、选民投票率及官员政治抱负有何影响？
AI.motivation: 随着重大自然灾害频发，理解其政治后果对民主问责至关重要，但现有研究对选民如何反应存在分歧。
AI.theoretical_framework: 回顾性投票理论、选民短视性与显著性理论。
AI.method: 利用1989-2021年美国市长选举的10,000多个候选选举观察数据，结合灾害事件全球登记簿，采用动态双向固定效应事件研究设计。
AI.findings: 选举季的灾害显著提高现任者得票率6个百分点，但降低选民投票率1.4个百分点；灾害管理经验使官员连任意愿提高12个百分点。
AI.theory_contributions: 调和了回顾性投票理论的冲突，强调了选民短视性与显著性的关键作用。
AI.practical_contributions: 揭示了危机塑造政治生涯的新渠道，表明灾害管理不仅是治理考验，也是政治抱负的催化剂。

detail.abstract: We examine behavioral frictions in entrepreneurs’ tax planning when choosing between corporate and partnership taxation under a check-the-box rule. Using German tax return data, we show that only a small fraction of entrepreneurs opt for corporate taxation, despite substantial potential tax savings. A pre-registered incentivized online experiment demonstrates that complexity aversion, status quo bias, and misperception about the corporate tax burden—arising from the interaction of corporate and deferred dividend taxation—help explain the preference for partnership taxation. We further find that these behavioral frictions heighten liquidity risk under the corporate system, particularly in the face of unexpected cash flow needs. Finally, a survey of German tax advisors indicates that tax advice only partially mitigates these frictions. Some advisors misperceive the benefits of corporate taxation, while others anticipate client biases and therefore refrain from recommending the corporate tax system.

AI.tldr: 研究探讨了企业家在‘勾选框规则’下选择公司税与合伙税时的行为摩擦。通过德国纳税数据发现，尽管公司税可带来显著节税，但仅少数企业家选择。实验表明，复杂性厌恶、现状偏见及对公司税负的误解（源于公司税与递延股息税的交互）是偏好合伙税的原因。此外，这些行为摩擦加剧了公司税制下的流动性风险，尤其是在突发现金流需求时。对德国税务顾问的调查显示，税务建议仅部分缓解了这些摩擦，部分顾问误解公司税优势，或预见到客户偏见而不推荐公司税制。
AI.research_question: 企业家在‘勾选框规则’下选择公司税与合伙税时存在哪些行为摩擦？
AI.motivation: 尽管公司税可带来显著节税，但现实中企业家选择较少，研究旨在揭示其背后的行为原因。
AI.theoretical_framework: 复杂性厌恶、现状偏见、税负误解理论。
AI.method: 使用德国纳税数据、预注册激励性在线实验及税务顾问调查。
AI.findings: 企业家偏好合伙税的行为摩擦包括复杂性厌恶、现状偏见及税负误解；这些摩擦加剧公司税制下的流动性风险；税务建议仅部分缓解摩擦。
AI.theory_contributions: 揭示了企业家税制选择中的行为摩擦及其理论机制。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者和税务顾问提供了改善税制设计和建议的依据。

title: The Politics of Nostalgia: How Digital Media Revives, Reinvents, and Polarises National Memory in India
affiliations: Independent Researcher

detail.title: The Politics of Nostalgia: How Digital Media Revives, Reinvents, and Polarises National Memory in India
detail.abstract: This paper explores the complex role of nostalgia in shaping national memory in contemporary India, with a particular focus on how digital media platforms amplify, reinvent, and polarise historical narratives. Drawing on cultural memory studies, media theory, and recent examples from social media, the paper argues that nostalgia is neither inherently conservative nor progressive, but rather functions as a contested space where multiple identities and political agendas converge. In the Indian context, digital nostalgia surfaces in diverse forms: from romanticised portrayals of ancient empires to grassroots rediscoveries of neglected regional figures and communities. While such narratives can foster cultural pride and inclusivity, they can equally fuel exclusionary identity politics and historical grievance. The study shows how algorithmic amplification and emotionally charged content simplify complex histories into shareable, polarised stories, contributing to both empowerment and division. Ultimately, the paper suggests that nostalgia, when critically engaged, can serve not only as a bridge to the past but also as a tool for a more reflective national conversation about belonging, history, and identity.

AI.tldr: 本文探讨了怀旧情绪在塑造当代印度国家记忆中的复杂作用，重点关注数字媒体平台如何放大、重塑和极化历史叙事。研究发现怀旧既非保守也非进步，而是一个多元身份和政治议程交汇的争议空间。

detail.abstract: This research paper explores the hidden drivers of financial success among Eritrean migrants navigating uncertainty, displacement, and limited institutional access. Drawing on original survey data collected from diaspora communities across East African host countries. I apply a mixed-methods framework combining ordinal and binary logistic regression, random forest classification, bootstrapping, and Bayesian causal mediation; to identify the structural and cultural variables most predictive of financial stability. The findings reveal that participation in Ekub, a traditional rotating savings association, and engagement in communal support systems are the strongest predictors of financial success, outperforming conventional factors such as age, education, or employment status. A bidirectional mediation model confirms that Ekub and community trust reinforce one another, forming a resilient economic infrastructure rooted in shared obligation and interdependence. Interpreting these patterns through historical, behavioral, and cultural lenses, the study invites a rethinking of individualistic assumptions in mainstream economic theory. It suggests that migrant resilience may be better understood not as personal perseverance, but as a structured, inherited system of trust, discipline, and communal logic.

detail.abstract: Made in France, defined as domestic value added content of the final domestic demand, fell by 11 points between 1965 and 2019, from 89% to 78%. This downward trend is common to European countries and reflects the growing globalization process of recent decades. The location of a production plant in France has consequences throughout the value chain. These spillovers increase the positive effects of setting up a new plant on economic activity and employment in France, compared to the creation of a similar plant abroad. The spillover effect, defined as the total value added of the new plant and its suppliers compared to the value added of the new plant alone, and simulated here under the strong assumption that the supply chain of the new plant is similar to those of existing firms, would be around 2.0 in manufacturing industry and 1.6 in market services. If greenhouse gas emissions from production increase in France, they decrease worldwide, since production in France is less carbon-intensive than in the countries that supply imports.

AI.tldr: 法国制造的国内价值占比从1965年的89%降至2019年的78%，反映了全球化的趋势。生产工厂在法国的设立对价值链有广泛影响，其溢出效应在制造业和服务业分别为2.0和1.6。此外，法国生产虽然增加国内温室气体排放，但全球排放减少，因其碳强度低于进口国。
AI.research_question: 法国制造的国内价值占比下降及其对经济和环境的影响是什么？
AI.motivation: 研究全球化背景下法国国内价值占比下降的趋势及其对经济活动和环境的影响。

AI.theory_contributions: 量化了全球化对国内价值占比的影响，并验证了溢出效应和碳强度的差异。

detail.abstract:
This comprehensive research paper presents an extensive quantitative analysis of the Nifty 50 index's weekly behavioral patterns spanning a decade from 2015 to 2025, with specific focus on price movements from Friday market open to the subsequent Thursday market close. The study establishes a robust statistical foundation for developing systematic weekly option selling strategies in the rapidly evolving Indian derivatives market. Through rigorous examination of over 470 weekly trading cycles encompassing various market conditions including bull markets, bear markets, and periods of extreme volatility, this research identifies consistent and exploitable patterns in index behavior. The analysis reveals that approximately 70% of weekly movements fall within ±300 points of the Friday opening price, while extreme movements exceeding ±700 points occur in only 5.3% of weeks, providing strong statistical support for strategic options positioning. The study employs sophisticated statistical methodologies including distribution analysis, volatility clustering examination, and extreme value theory to develop a comprehensive understanding of weekly price behavior. The findings inform the development of a rules-based options selling strategy that systematically capitalizes on time decay (theta) while implementing multi-layered risk management protocols through data-driven strike price adjustments and dynamic stop-loss mechanisms.

The research demonstrates the strategy's potential for generating consistent passive income within clearly defined risk parameters, with theoretical returns significantly exceeding traditional fixed-income investments. The empirical evidence supports the viability of systematic options selling approaches when implemented with appropriate discipline and risk management safeguards. This study contributes significantly to the academic literature on systematic trading strategies and provides practical insights for both retail and institutional traders seeking to exploit the structural characteristics of weekly options in emerging market derivatives. The findings offer valuable guidance for evidence-based derivative trading decisions and establish a benchmark for future research in this rapidly expanding field.

AI.tldr: 本研究通过对Nifty 50指数2015至2025年每周行为模式的定量分析，揭示了系统性期权卖出策略的统计基础，并开发了一种基于规则的策略，利用时间衰减和风险管理机制。

detail.abstract: As generative artificial intelligence reshapes the conditions of knowledge production, public education faces an epistemological crisis: students are increasingly trained to retrieve answers, yet lack the tools to interrogate the process of knowing itself. This paper argues that epistemology-the philosophical study of knowledge-must be reintegrated into the educational core as both a conceptual and practical literacy. Drawing on critical theory, especially the work of Slavoj Žižek, as well as cognitive science and curriculum studies, the paper examines how prompt-based AI systems simulate inquiry while concealing the ideological and epistemic assumptions they encode. The analysis traces the erosion of epistemic agency in contemporary classrooms and proposes a curricular framework that positions epistemology as a foundation for critical thinking, democratic resilience, and philosophical inquiry in the age of machine knowledge.

AI.tldr: 本文探讨生成式人工智能如何重塑知识生产条件，导致公共教育面临认识论危机，并提出将认识论重新融入教育核心的必要性。

detail.abstract: This paper examines the impact of multiple regulatory constraints on the financing of the economy in the context of the implementation of the Basel III regulation on capital and liquidity. We propose a simple theoretical model of bank lending decision to analyse the interactions between these various regulatory requirements and the conditions under which some constraints may bind while others may not. Building on the predictions of this theoretical model, we estimate the impact of these different regulatory requirements on lending growth, on a panel of 54 French banks since 2014. Our results indicate that four pairwise interactions, most of them involving the leverage ratio, have a significant effect on lending growth. We also emphasize that the regulatory ratios interact more for banks with lower regulatory ratios and in periods of financial stress. More specifically, our results highlight a significant relationship of partial substitutability between the leverage ratio, the LCR and the NSFR for such banks in such periods, resulting from the positive effect of bank own funds on liquidity.

detail.abstract: This study investigates how variability in research topics influences the evolutionary dynamics of scientific and technological fields, offering strategic insights for innovation management and technological forecasting. By applying entropy measures and variance decomposition, we analyze four emerging quantum domains-quantum optics, metrology, imaging, and sensing-to quantify the diversity and stability of their research trajectories. Our findings reveal that quantum optics exhibits lower variability and more stable developmental paths (entropy H = 0.83), while quantum sensing demonstrates higher variability and uncertainty (H = 0.93), indicating divergent evolutionary patterns. Variance analysis shows that 91.7% of the observed variability occurs within fields rather than between them, underscoring internal topic diversity as a critical driver of scientific and technological evolution. This suggests that variability is not merely noise but a structural feature that shapes the direction and pace of innovation. These insights have significant implications for technological forecasting. Fields characterized by high variability may signal earlystage, exploratory dynamics with multiple competing paradigms, requiring flexible and adaptive forecasting models. Conversely, low-variability fields may reflect more mature trajectories, where trend extrapolation and exploitation strategies can be more reliable. From a strategic perspective, our results suggest that innovation strategies should be aligned with the variability profile of the target field: exploratory approaches are better suited for high-entropy domains, while exploitative strategies can effectively support incremental innovation in low-entropy areas. This study contributes to the theoretical understanding of scientific evolution and provides actionable guidance for R&D managers, foresight analysts, and policymakers seeking to allocate resources, design innovation portfolios, and anticipate technological shifts in emerging quantum technologies.

detail.abstract: The COVID-19 pandemic started in December 2019, the situation has changed work environments everywhere around the world & in Beribandh, which is in Dhaka the capital of Bangladesh, the construction workforces are not excluded from this. During the pandemic people from every class learnt the importance and value of safety and good health. In Bangladesh, traditionally construction workers are exposed to risks like falling from building, dust and heavy physical work. But this industry have faced new challenges after pandemic situation, construction laborers now struggle with added issues, including reduced safety checks and difficulty finding proper healthcare. Many construction companies started reducing safety practices and healthcare facilities in case of reducing companys expenses. Most dangerous thing is many of the construction sites don’t have any primary medical facilities near the site. As construction projects came back into action after pandemic haze, safety rules may not always be followed strictly, leaving workers feeling uncertain and more vulnerable. This research will be conducted to understand how construction workers are coping with these challenges in a post-pandemic world & by gathering their daily experiences and observing the little changes in daily practices, we hope to find simple and clear solutions to improve safety practices and health care in construction sites. It will involve a sample of 50 workers to gather insights into their experiences and conditions. Central to this study is intended to help make the construction work environment safer and easier for these vital community members.

detail.abstract: The conventional understanding of stability, order, and progress often centers on permanence and linear growth. Yet, across every observable scale of existence—from the quantum foam to the grand cosmic expanse—a paradoxical principle appears to govern the very essence of cohesion, evolution, and systemic “learning”: Adaptive order from inherent f lux. This principle posits that complex systems establish their enduring integrity and evolve their capabilities through the continuous shedding, transformation, and self governing renewal of their components. This project aims to articulate this pervasive yet often elusive universal principle. Despite its fundamental role in the universe’s operation, its overarching nature remains obscured for several critical reasons: operation at unseen layers, challenging deeply ingrained linear perceptions, obscurity by disciplinary silos, and misinterpretation of dissolution as an endpoint rather than a necessary catalyst for regeneration and optimization. By developing a comprehensive conceptual framework that details how this principle manifests across cosmic, biological, social, and technological domains, this project seeks to generate new research questions and create a compelling narrative that fosters interdisciplinary discussion. The goal is to illuminate this universal principle, revealing how apparent destruction or decay is, in fact, an indispensable mechanism for generating emergent properties, fostering resilience, and enabling long term systemic vitality.

title: Biar Lambat Asal Selamat: The Slow But Safe Twenty-Five Year Recalibration of Personal Bankruptcy in Malaysia
affiliations: University of Illinois Chicago School of Law

detail.title: Biar Lambat Asal Selamat: The Slow But Safe Twenty-Five Year Recalibration of Personal Bankruptcy in Malaysia
detail.abstract: A popular Malay proverb advises, “let it be slow, as long as it is safe” (biar lambat asal selamat). The phrase aptly characterizes the quarter-century, multistage evolution of personal bankruptcy in Malaysia. That process culminated in late 2023 with reforms that mirror those in neighboring Singapore and many other more distant countries. Malaysian bankruptcy law has long included a very limited debt discharge, but as it left more and more economically debilitated debtors in perpetual bankruptcy limbo, policymakers became dissatisfied with leaving a huge and growing mass of debtors to languish. In 1998, they began taking a series of hesitant steps to alleviate the flow of cases into and, more importantly, accelerate the exit of cases out of the bankruptcy system. Eighteen months of empirical data on the effects of this revolution in Malaysian bankruptcy policy now reveal the important but limited effects of this process of entry and exit recalibration. The halting series of legislative and regulatory changes and consequent empirical results in Malaysia from 1999 to 2025 are enlightening as to the purpose and (in)effectiveness of various “safe” approaches to reducing the incidence of personal bankruptcy and expanding discharge relief. This article reveals those lessons. It also reveals the motivations for these monumental shifts in Malaysian bankruptcy policy, with a closer look at the nuanced role of Islamic law and individual religious conviction in a modern democratic majority-Muslim state.

detail.title: Inflation's Grip: Analyzing Changes in Consumer Behavior and Economic Dynamics
detail.abstract: This paper investigates the complex interplay between inflation and consumer behavior, emphasizing how rising prices affect purchasing decisions and broader economic trends. The literature review identifies several critical factors that influence consumer spending patterns during inflationary periods, such as increased price sensitivity, shifts in brand loyalty, and the psychological effects of economic uncertainty. Research findings indicate that inflation significantly alters consumer decision-making, particularly impacting low-income households that face the brunt of price hikes on essential goods .The study reveals that consumers adopt a more strategic shopping approach, focusing on value and engaging in careful planning to counteract the adverse effects of inflation on their purchasing power. Furthermore, it highlights the role of purchasing power as a vital determinant of consumer spending, suggesting that government assistance and reliance on credit can help maintain spending levels even in the face of rising unemployment.Additionally, the paper underscores the necessity of incorporating psychological factors into economic analyses, as emotional reactions to inflation can lead to significant changes in spending, saving, and investment behaviors. By exploring these dynamics, the research aims to provide essential insights for policymakers and businesses striving to address the challenges posed by inflation and to formulate effective strategies that resonate with consumer concerns. Ultimately, this study enhances the understanding of how inflation influences consumer behavior and its broader implications for economic stability.
